name: Cloud
text:
My memory ends here.
I don’t remember anything after that.
text_jp:
俺の記憶は　ここで終わりだ
あとは覚えていない

name: Barret
text: Hey, hey, hey now!
text_jp: おいおい　おいおいおい！

name: Aerith
text: ‟Hero Sephiroth Missing During Training”
text_jp: 『英雄セフィロス　訓練中に行方不明』

name: Aerith
text: I watched that news with my mom.
text_jp: そんなニュース　お母さんと見たよ

name: Aerith
text:
And then a few days later,
they announced, ‟Actually, he died in battle,” right?
text_jp:
そして　何日かあとに
『実は戦死だった』って発表されたよね

name: Aerith
text: Yes, that's right!
text_jp: うん　そうそう！

name: Barret
text:
Shinra’s the one makin’ the news.
Those bastards do whatever they want.
text_jp:
ニュースを作っているのは神羅だ
やつら　やり放題だからな

name: Barret
text: You’d have to be crazy to believe ‘em!
text_jp: 信じるほうがどうかしてる！

name: Aerith
text: I believed it, though.
text_jp: わたし　信じてましたけど

name: Barret
text: Oh… right, that.
text_jp: ああ……あれだ

name: Barret
text: Anyway, Shinra’s to blame for everything.
text_jp: とにかく神羅がぜんぶ悪いってこった

name: Cloud
text:
Whatever the truth was five years ago,
we fought Sephiroth in Midgar.
text_jp:
５年前の真実はともかく
俺たちは　ミッドガルでセフィロスと戦ってきた

name: Cloud
text: He’s alive.
text_jp: あいつは　生きている

name: Aerith
text: Alive, or… like, he’s here?
text_jp: 生きているっていうか　いる？

name: Tifa
text: Why’d he show up now, of all times?
text_jp: どうして　いまになって現れたんだろう

name: Tifa
text: What was he doing for those five years?
text_jp: ５年間　なにをしていたのかな

name: Cloud
text: Sephiroth’s picking up where he left off that day.
text_jp: セフィロスは　あの日の続きを始めたんだ

name: Cloud
text:
With Jenova, he’s gonna take back this planet
and continue his plan to become its ruler.
text_jp:
ジェノバとともに　この星を取り戻して
支配者になるとかいう計画の続きを

name: Tifa
text: After five years?
text_jp: ５年ぶりに？

name: Tifa
text:
Sorry for being so persistent.
It’s just… it’s been bothering me.
text_jp:
ごめんね　しつこくて
でも　気になって……

name: Barret
text: This Jenova thing—I don’t get it either.
text_jp: ジェノバってのも　よくわかんねえな

name: Aerith
text: Sorry.
text_jp: ごめん

name: Aerith
text:
The wastelands? I’m not used to ‘em, and I’m wiped out.
My back’s all stiff.
text_jp:
荒野？　慣れてなくて疲れちゃった
背中　ガチガチ

name: Tifa
text: Let me feel it a sec.
text_jp: ちょっと触らせて

name: Tifa
text: Yikes.
text_jp: たいへん

name: Tifa
text:
But I might be able to do something about it.
Wanna head to the room?
text_jp:
でも　なんとかできるかも
部屋行こう？

name: Barret
text: Guess we’ll call it a night here, huh?
text_jp: んじゃ　今日はこの辺にしとくか

name: Barret
text:
In the end, there’s no way we’d figure out
what Sephiroth’s been up to anyway.
text_jp:
結局　セフィロスがなにしてたかなんて
オレたちにわかるはずねえしな

name: Barret
text: Hey, hey, hey, hey now!
text_jp: おいおいおいおいおい～

name: Barret
text: Red…
text_jp: レッド……

name: Aerith
text: Good night.
text_jp: おやすみ

name: Tifa
text: Good night.
text_jp: おやすみなさい

name: Tifa
text: Aerith, you asleep?
text_jp: エアリス　寝ちゃった？

name: Aerith
text: Nope, just barely.
text_jp: ううん　ギリギリ

name: Tifa
text:
Cloud…
Where was he, and what was he doing these past five years?
text_jp:
クラウド……
この５年間　どこでなにをしてたのかな

name: Aerith
text: You’re asking me?
text_jp: それ　わたしにきく？

name: Tifa
text: I thought maybe you knew everything.
text_jp: なんでも　知ってるのかなって

name: Aerith
text: I think I did know.
text_jp: 知ってたんだと思う

name: Aerith
text: But it was taken from me.
text_jp: でも　取られちゃった

name: Aerith
text: …Erased, maybe?
text_jp: ……消されちゃった？

name: Tifa
text: By the Whispers?
text_jp: フィーラーに？

name: Aerith
text: Probably.
text_jp: たぶん

name: Tifa
text: Did they take something from me too?
text_jp: 私も　取られたのかな

name: Aerith
text: Like what?
text_jp: なにを？

name: Tifa
text:
In my memory, five years ago,
Cloud didn’t come to Nibelheim.
text_jp:
私の記憶では　５年前
クラウドはニブルヘイムに来なかったの

name: Tifa
text: Cloud, you awake?
text_jp: クラウド　起きてる？

name: Tifa
text: Sorry, were you asleep?
text_jp: ごめん　寝てた？

name: Cloud
text: No. Something happen?
text_jp: いや　なにかあったのか

name: Tifa
text:
No, but…
there’s something I wanna ask you, Cloud.
text_jp:
ううん　でも
クラウドに聞きたいことがあって

name: Tifa
text: Wanna talk for a bit?
text_jp: すこし　話さない？

name: Cloud
text: Sure.
text_jp: ああ

name: Tifa
text: Then let’s move somewhere else.
text_jp: じゃあ　場所変えよっか

name: Tifa
text: This way, this way.
text_jp: こっち　こっち

name: Sephiroth
text: Tifa should be dead by my hand.
text_jp: ティファは　俺が殺したはずだ

name: Sephiroth
text: Then who is that?
text_jp: ならば　あれは誰だ？

name: Sephiroth
text: Truly, there’s no room for carelessness.
text_jp: まったく　油断も隙もないな

name: Innkeeper
text:
You don’t look well.
Old war wounds acting up?
text_jp:
顔色が　すぐれないようですね
戦場の古傷でも痛みますか？

name: Innkeeper
text:
Truth is, I used to work for Shinra too.
Now I run this humble inn, but sometimes those old scars ache.
text_jp:
実は　私も神羅あがりでしてね
今はしがない宿屋ですが　たまに古傷が痛むんです

name: Innkeeper
text:
Well, my time at Shinra was
a long while back, though…
text_jp:
まあ　私が神羅にいたのは
ずいぶんと前のことですが……

name: Innkeeper
text:
Why not rest in your room?
Might do you some good.
text_jp:
部屋で　お休みになられたほうが
よろしいのでは？

name: Tifa
text: Midgar’s that way, right?
text_jp: ミッドガル　あっちかな

name: Tifa
text: Hey, um…
text_jp: あのね

name: Cloud
text: I’ve got a question for you too.
text_jp: 俺も　聞きたいことがある

name: Tifa
text: Go ahead.
text_jp: どうぞ

name: Cloud
text:
Five years ago, that day,
I saw you in the mako reactor, Tifa.
text_jp:
５年前　あの日
魔晄炉の中で　俺はティファを見た

name: Cloud
text: Blood was pouring from a deep wound.
text_jp: 深い傷から　血が流れ出して

name: Cloud
text: I thought it was too late for you.
text_jp: もう　手遅れだと思った

name: Tifa
text: Yeah…
text_jp: うん……

name: Tifa
text:
Are you doubting me?
Wondering if I’m not the same person from back then?
text_jp:
それって　私を疑ってるの？
あの時とは別人じゃないかって

name: Tifa
text: I never imagined you’d suspect me like this.
text_jp: こんなふうに疑われるなんて　思ってもいなかった

name: Tifa
text: Hey, look.
text_jp: ねえ　見て

name: Tifa
text: See? The scar from that time.
text_jp: ほら　あの時の傷

name: Tifa
text:
The one who saved me at the reactor
was Master Zangan.
text_jp:
魔晄炉で私を助けてくれたのは
ザンガン先生だった

name: Tifa
text: He carried me and risked his life crossing the river.
text_jp: 先生は　私を抱えて命懸けで川をくだった

name: Tifa
text:
The doctor where I was taken operated all night.
The nurses never left my side.
text_jp:
運ばれた先のお医者さんは徹夜で手術
看護師さんたちは　ずっと私を見ていてくれた

name: Tifa
text: Thanks to people like them, I survived.
text_jp: そういう人たちのおかげで　私は生きのびたの

name: Tifa
text: What about you, Cloud?
text_jp: クラウドは　どうなの？

name: Tifa
text: What were you doing after you left the village?
text_jp: 村を出てから　なにをしてたの？

name: Tifa
text: These past five years?
text_jp: この５年間は？

name: Cloud
text: It’s a job with a lot of secrets.
text_jp: 秘密の多い仕事なんだ

name: Tifa
text: Guess it would be.
text_jp: そうでしょうね

name: Tifa
text: Sorry. I’m heading back to the room.
text_jp: ごめん　部屋に戻るね

name: Tifa
text:
We weren’t exactly best buddies
as childhood friends, were we?
text_jp:
私たち　幼なじみっていうほど
仲良しじゃなかったよね

name: Cloud
text: Maybe not.
text_jp: かもな

name: Tifa
text: Did I get too excited about reuniting?
text_jp: 再会が嬉しくて　はしゃぎすぎたかな

name: Barret
text: You two have a fight?
text_jp: もめたのか？

name: Cloud
text: No.
text_jp: いや

name: Barret
text: I don’t wanna deal with any more trouble.
text_jp: これ以上　問題は抱え込みたくねえ

name: Barret
text: Got it?
text_jp: いいな

name: Cloud
text: I’m going to bed.
text_jp: 寝る

name: Red XIII
text: The night always gives way to dawn.
text_jp: 夜は　必ず明けるさ

name: Cloud
text: This is…
text_jp: これは……

name: Innkeeper
text: A little gift from our inn.
text_jp: 当宿からの　ささやかなプレゼントです

name: Innkeeper
text:
Feel free to use it as a communication tool
if you’d like.
text_jp:
よろしければ　コミュニケーションツールとして
ご活用ください

name: Cloud
text: Queen’s Blood?
text_jp: クイーンズ・ブラッド？

name: Innkeeper
text: Good morning.
text_jp: おはようございます

name: Broden
text:
My greetings are a bit late.
I’m Broden, the owner of this inn.
text_jp:
ご挨拶が遅くなりました
私はブロード　この宿のオーナーです

name: Broden
text: Everyone else has already gone out.
text_jp: みなさんは　すでにお出かけですよ

name: Broden
text:
Oh, right.
I’ve got a message for you from Barret.
text_jp:
ああ　そうだ
バレットさんから伝言をあずかってます

name: Broden
text:
‘To the sleepy SOLDIER:
Today’s a free day.’
text_jp:
『寝ぼすけのソルジャーさんよ
　今日は１日　自由行動だ』

name: Broden
text:
‘Might as well check your gear
while you’ve got the time.’
text_jp: 『いまのうちに　装備の点検でもしておくんだな』

name: Broden
text: …That’s what he said.
text_jp: ……とのことです

name: Broden
text: How about stopping by the weapon shop first?
text_jp: まずは　武器屋へ行かれてみてはいかがでしょう？

name: Cloud
text: Yeah, sounds good.
text_jp: そうだな

name: Broden
text:
Oh, and Cloud,
you’ve got a ‘Skill Book,’ right?
text_jp:
それと　クラウドさん
『スキルブック』をお持ちですよね

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: ああ

name: Broden
text:
Then why not swing by
the bookstore while you’re at it?
text_jp:
でしたら　ついでに
本屋にも寄られてはどうでしょう？

name: Broden
text:
The bookstore in Kalm is the original branch
of a prestigious magic shop.
text_jp: カームの本屋は　由緒ある魔導書店の第１号店

name: Broden
text: I’m pretty sure they’ll give you a first-time discount.
text_jp: たしか　初回はサービスしてくれるはずです

name: Broden
text:
A skilled craftsman there
can unlock new abilities for you.
text_jp:
熟練の技能士が
お客様の新たな能力を引き出すように

name: Broden
text: They’ll customize your Skill Book for you.
text_jp: スキルブックを　カスタマイズしてくれますよ

name: Broden
text: Kalm’s a simple, nice little town.
text_jp: カームは素朴でいい街ですよ

name: Broden
text: Take your time sightseeing.
text_jp: ゆっくり観光なさってください

name: Broden
text: Have you been to the weapon shop and bookstore yet?
text_jp: 武器屋と本屋には行かれましたかな

name: Red XIII
text: You’re up?
text_jp: 起きたか

name: Red XIII
text: You must’ve been really exhausted.
text_jp: よほど　疲れていたようだな

name: Cloud
text: Were you waiting for me?
text_jp: 俺を待っていたのか？

name: Red XIII
text: I realized I hadn’t thanked you yet.
text_jp: 感謝を伝えていなかったと思ってな

name: Red XIII
text: Thanks to you and the others, I escaped Hojo.
text_jp: クラウドたちのおかげで　宝条から逃げられた

name: Cloud
text: Just how things worked out.
text_jp: なりゆきだ

name: Red XIII
text: Even so, a debt must be repaid.
text_jp: だとしても　恩はかならず返す

name: Red XIII
text: I’ll stick with you for a while.
text_jp: しばらくは　一緒に行く

name: Red XIII
text: Oh, right.
text_jp: そうだ

name: Red XIII
text: If you’re checking gear, mind handling mine too?
text_jp: 装備の点検に行くなら　私の装備品も頼む

name: Cloud
text: Got it.
text_jp: わかった

name: Cloud
text: Pretty bossy for a newbie.
text_jp: えらそうな新入りだな

name: Tifa
text: Morning.
text_jp: おはよう

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: ああ

name: Tifa
text: Looks like everyone’s gone to check out the town.
text_jp: みんな　街を見に行ったみたい

name: Cloud
text: Seems that way.
text_jp: そうらしいな

name: Tifa
text: Doesn’t that tank remind you of something?
text_jp: あのタンク　思い出さない？

name: NPC
text: Doesn’t that tank remind you of something?
text_jp: あのタンク　思い出さない？

name: NPC
text: The place we promised.
text_jp: 約束した場所だ

name: NPC
text: It’s like Nibelheim’s water tower.
text_jp: ニブルヘイムの給水塔に似てるな

name: NPC
text: Just a mako tank.
text_jp: ただの魔晄タンクだ

name: Cloud
text: Yeah, the place we promised.
text_jp: ああ　約束した場所だ

name: Tifa
text: I really liked the outfit I wore back then.
text_jp: あの時の服　お気に入りだった

name: Cloud
text: Yeah, that kinda blue… or maybe green one.
text_jp: ああ　水色みたいな　緑みたいな色の

name: Tifa
text: Yep.
text_jp: うん

name: Cloud
text: It’s like Nibelheim’s water tower.
text_jp: ニブルヘイムの給水塔に似てるな

name: Tifa
text: Yeah.
text_jp: うん

name: Tifa
text:
It’s a place full of memories,
but it’s gone now.
text_jp:
思い出の場所なのに
今はもう　ないんだよね

name: Cloud
text: Just a mako tank.
text_jp: ただの魔晄タンクだ

name: Tifa
text: Right… yeah.
text_jp: そう……だね

name: Cloud
text:
They ship mako from Midgar
and store it in that tank.
text_jp:
ミッドガルから魔晄を運んで
あのタンクに貯めておくんだ

name: Tifa
text: Oh, I see.
text_jp: そうなんだ

name: Tifa
text: It’s peaceful. Nice town, huh?
text_jp: おだやかで　いい街だね

name: Tifa
text:
Makes me wanna take it easy.
Is that okay…?
text_jp:
なんだか　のんびりしちゃうね
いいのかな……

name: Barret
text: Hey, up bright and early!
text_jp: おう　お早いお目覚めで

name: Cloud
text: Drinking already?
text_jp: 朝から飲んでるのか

name: Barret
text: Ain’t booze, man.
text_jp: 酒じゃねえよ

name: Barret
text: I’ll raise a toast once we rebuild Seventh Heaven.
text_jp: 祝杯は　セブンスヘブンを再建してからだ

name: NPC
text: I’ll raise a toast once we rebuild Seventh Heaven.
text_jp: 祝杯は　セブンスヘブンを再建してからだ

name: NPC
text: I’ll treat you then.
text_jp: その時は俺がおごろう

name: NPC
text: It’ll be some good liquor.
text_jp: うまい酒になりそうだな

name: NPC
text: Gotta wait a while, huh?
text_jp: 当分おあずけだな

name: Cloud
text: I’ll treat you then.
text_jp: その時は　俺がおごろう

name: Barret
text: Well, ain’t that nice!
text_jp: そりゃ　うれしいねえ

name: Barret
text: Guess I’d better stock up on the pricey stuff.
text_jp: んじゃ　高い酒を仕入れとかないとな

name: Cloud
text: It’ll be some good liquor.
text_jp: うまい酒になりそうだな

name: Barret
text:
Hell yeah! We’ll throw a big opening party
and make a ruckus!
text_jp:
おうよ　ハデな開店パーティーを開いて
ドンチャン騒ぎよ

name: Cloud
text: Gotta wait a while, huh?
text_jp: 当分　おあずけだな

name: Barret
text: We’ll get it done soon enough.
text_jp: また　すぐにやれるさ

name: Barret
text:
Looks like a long trip ahead.
Make sure you’re prepped.
text_jp:
長旅になりそうだ
準備は　しっかりしとけよ

name: Barret
text: Don’t buy souvenirs yet—they’ll just weigh you down.
text_jp: 土産はまだ買うなよ　荷物になるだけだ

name: Red XIII
text: Done checking your gear?
text_jp: 装備の点検は　終わったのか

name: Cloud
text: What’re you doing here?
text_jp: ここで　なにをしている

name: Red XIII
text:
Keeping watch.
Shinra could show up any time.
text_jp:
見張りだ
いつ神羅が来ても　おかしくはない

name: NPC
text: Shinra could show up any time.
text_jp: 神羅が来ても　おかしくはない

name: NPC
text: Impressive. Reliable as always.
text_jp: さすが　頼りになるな

name: NPC
text: Appreciate it.
text_jp: 助かるよ

name: NPC
text: So serious.
text_jp: 真面目だな

name: Cloud
text: Impressive. Reliable as always.
text_jp: さすが　頼りになるな

name: Red XIII
text: Flattery won’t get you anything.
text_jp: ほめても　なにも出ないぞ

name: Cloud
text: Appreciate it.
text_jp: 助かるよ

name: Red XIII
text: Don’t mention it. It’s for my sake too.
text_jp: 気にするな　私自身のためだ

name: Cloud
text: So serious.
text_jp: 真面目だな

name: Red XIII
text:
No one else is doing it,
so I have no choice.
text_jp:
誰もやらないからな
しかたなくやっている

name: Red XIII
text: Leave the lookout to me.
text_jp: 見張りは　まかせろ

name: Red XIII
text: No trouble so far.
text_jp: いまのところ　異状はない

name: Aerith
text: Morning, Cloud!
text_jp: クラウド　おはよう

name: Cloud
text: Yeah. What’re you up to?
text_jp: ああ　なにをしてるんだ？

name: Aerith
text: I was looking for you, Cloud.
text_jp: クラウド　探してたの

name: Cloud
text: Oh.
text_jp: そうか

name: Aerith
text: Got business at the bookstore?
text_jp: 本屋に用事？

name: Aerith
text: Hey, got time after that?
text_jp: あのね　そのあと時間ある？

name: Aerith
text: Wanna go up the tower?
text_jp: 塔のうえ　行ってみない？

name: NPC
text: Wanna go up the tower?
text_jp: 塔のうえ　行ってみない？

name: NPC
text: Sure, let’s go.
text_jp: ああ　行こう

name: NPC
text: Guess I’ve got no choice.
text_jp: しかたないな

name: NPC
text: I’m not free.
text_jp: ヒマじゃない

name: Cloud
text: Sure, let’s go.
text_jp: ああ　行こう

name: Aerith
text: Really? Yay!
text_jp: ホント？　やった！

name: Cloud
text: Guess I’ve got no choice.
text_jp: しかたないな

name: Aerith
text: That way of putting it!
text_jp: その言い方！

name: Aerith
text: But, well, whatever.
text_jp: でも　ま　いっか

name: Cloud
text: I’m not free.
text_jp: ヒマじゃない

name: Aerith
text: What? No way~ Please!
text_jp: ええ　そんなあ～　お願い！

name: Cloud
text: Fine.
text_jp: わかった

name: Aerith
text: Yay!
text_jp: やった！

name: Aerith
text:
Then I’ll go grab
the tickets.
text_jp:
それじゃあ
入場券　もらっておくから

name: Aerith
text: Meet me in front of the tower.
text_jp: 塔の前で　集合

name: Aerith
text: See you later, then!
text_jp: それじゃあ　あとでね

name: Aerith
text: Meet in front of the tower, okay?
text_jp: 塔の前で集合　だよ

name: Bookstore Clerk
text:
Welcome!
Come on in to the magic bookstore.
text_jp:
いらっしゃいませ
魔導書店へ　ようこそ

name: Bookstore Clerk
text:
Hey, you.
First time customizing a Skill Book?
text_jp:
お客さん
スキルブックをカスタマイズするのは初めて？

name: Bookstore Clerk
text:
To upgrade a Skill Book, the owner needs
the right knowledge, experience, and skills.
text_jp:
スキルブックを強化するには　持ち主に
それ相応の知識や経験　能力が必要なんだけど

name: Bookstore Clerk
text:
But you look good to go.
Shall we get started?
text_jp:
お客さんは大丈夫そうだね
早速　やってみようか

name: Bookstore Clerk
text: Well, that’s about it for a first go.
text_jp: まあ　最初はこんなもんかな

name: Bookstore Clerk
text:
Skill Books grow stronger
as your bonds with your companions deepen.
text_jp:
スキルブックは　仲間との絆が深まることで
さらに力を引き出すことができるよ

name: Bookstore Clerk
text:
Come back anytime
you wanna upgrade it again.
text_jp:
また　強化したくなったら
いつでも持ってきなよ

name: Bookstore Clerk
text: Hey, welcome!
text_jp: いらっしゃい

name: Bookstore Clerk
text: Oh, you’re back!
text_jp: おっ　また来たね

name: Bookstore Clerk
text: So, what’ll it be today?
text_jp: 今日は　どうします？

name: Bookstore Clerk
text: Whenever you’re ready!
text_jp: いつでもどうぞ

name: Bookstore Clerk
text: Stop by again!
text_jp: また寄ってね

name: Bookstore Clerk
text: Thanks for coming!
text_jp: ありがとうございました

name: Weapon Shop
text: Welcome!
text_jp: いらっしゃい

name: Weapon Shop
text:
Hey, kid,
that’s a cool weapon you’ve got.
text_jp:
おっ　兄ちゃん
渋い武器持ってるね

name: Weapon Shop
text: It’s got that well-worn, badass look.
text_jp: 使い込まれた　いい色してやがる

name: Weapon Shop
text:
But it’s still got tons of potential.
Tune it up right, and it’ll get even stronger.
text_jp:
ただ　そいつのポテンシャルはまだまだだ
しっかり整備すれば　もっと強くなるぜ

name: Weapon Shop
text: How about I give you a hand?
text_jp: どうだい　手ほどきしようか？

name: Weapon Shop
text:
Nice! It’s shining even brighter now.
That weapon’s grinning ear to ear.
text_jp:
いいねえ　輝きが増したじゃねえか
武器もニッコリ笑ってやがる

name: Weapon Shop
text:
Keep customizing it
on the regular, got it?
text_jp:
これからも　定期的に
カスタマイズしてやるんだな

name: Weapon Shop
text:
While you’re here,
check out our stock too.
text_jp:
せっかくだ
ウチの商品も見ていってくれよ

name: Weapon Shop
text: Take good care of that weapon!
text_jp: そんじゃ　武器は大切にな

name: Weapon Shop
text: Hey, kid, how’s it going?
text_jp: よお　兄ちゃん　調子はどうだ？

name: Weapon Shop
text: Welcome! Take your time looking around.
text_jp: いらっしゃい　ゆっくり見ていけよ

name: Weapon Shop
text: We’ve got some quality stuff here.
text_jp: ウチはいい品　そろえてるぜ

name: Weapon Shop
text: Thanks, man!
text_jp: ありがとよ

name: Weapon Shop
text: Come back anytime!
text_jp: また　いつでも来いよ

name: Weapon Shop
text: Take care out there!
text_jp: そんじゃ　気をつけてな

name: Staff
text: Sorry, we’re still setting up.
text_jp: すみません　まだ準備中なんです

name: Staff
text: Please come back a little later.
text_jp: しばらくあとで　お越しください

name: Aerith
text:
They’re still prepping.
Cloud, why don’t you finish your errands?
text_jp:
準備中だって
クラウド　用事すませてきたら？

name: Aerith
text: Cloud, over here!
text_jp: クラウド　こっちこっち！

name: Aerith
text: Alright, let’s go!
text_jp: それじゃ　行こっか

name: Aerith
text: Midgar’s that way, right?
text_jp: ミッドガル　こっちだったよね

name: Cloud
text: Should be.
text_jp: そのはずだ

name: Aerith
text: It looks so small from here.
text_jp: ここから見ると　小さいね

name: Cloud
text: It’s pretty far off.
text_jp: 距離があるからな

name: Aerith
text: Hey, did something happen with Tifa?
text_jp: ねえ　ティファとなにかあった？

name: Aerith
text: Well, y’know, we shared a room.
text_jp: ほら　部屋　同じだったから

name: Cloud
text: Did she say something?
text_jp: なにか言ってたか

name: Aerith
text: Not really anything specific.
text_jp: 特には　なにも

name: Aerith
text: But I get it.
text_jp: でも　わかる

name: Aerith
text: I’m kinda jealous of childhood friends.
text_jp: 幼なじみなんて　うらやましい

name: Aerith
text: You’ve gotta cherish them.
text_jp: 大切にしなくちゃ

name: Barret
text: Damn it!
text_jp: ちきしょう

name: Search Soldier
text: Go!
text_jp: 行け！

name: Search Soldier
text:
Squad A, Squad B, split up!
Find Avalanche!
text_jp:
Ａ班　Ｂ班わかれろ
アバランチを探せ！

name: Search Soldier
text: Let’s move!
text_jp: 行くぞ！

name: Aerith
text: Are they looking for us?
text_jp: わたしたち　探してる？

name: Cloud
text: Probably.
text_jp: おそらく

name: Broden
text: Oh, there you are.
text_jp: ああ　いたか

name: Broden
text: We’ll talk later—just get back to the inn for now.
text_jp: 話はあと　とにかく宿に戻れ

name: Aerith
text: But…
text_jp: でも……

name: Broden
text: Your friends have evacuated. You’re the only ones left.
text_jp: 仲間は避難した　あとは君たちだけだ

name: Broden
text:
Don’t even think about fighting.
The town’ll get caught up in it.
text_jp:
戦おうなんて　考えないでくれ
街が巻き込まれる

name: Aerith
text: Let’s run.
text_jp: 逃げよう

name: Broden
text: Follow me.
text_jp: ついてこい

name: Broden
text: We’ll take the back alleys.
text_jp: 裏路地を行こう

name: Broden
text: Where you headed?
text_jp: どこへ行く？

name: Broden
text: What’re you doing?
text_jp: なにをしている

name: Item Shop
text: You never know what’s out there—be prepared.
text_jp: なにがあるかわからない　備えはしっかりな

name: Item Shop
text: Take care, alright?
text_jp: 気をつけてな

name: Search Soldier
text: All clear.
text_jp: 異状なし

name: Search Soldier
text: Tch, where the hell are they hiding?
text_jp: チッ　どこに隠れてやがる

name: Search Soldier
text:
Hey, you over there!
Seen any suspicious folks?
text_jp:
おい　そこのおまえ
不審者を見なかったか？

name: Kalm Resident
text: No, I haven’t seen anything…
text_jp: いえ　私はなにも……

name: Search Soldier
text:
Anyone else spot anything suspicious?!
Report it immediately if you do!
text_jp:
他に不審者を見かけたヤツはいないか！
見かけた者は　ただちに報告しろ

name: Search Soldier
text: Still haven’t found ‘em? Hurry up!
text_jp: まだ見つからないのか　急ぐぞ！

name: Search Soldier
text: Yes, sir!
text_jp: ハッ！

name: Search Soldier
text: You! Why’d you run?!
text_jp: 貴様　なぜ逃げた！

name: Kalm Resident
text: No, I just… you were chasing me…
text_jp: いや　追いかけられたから……

name: Search Soldier
text: Suspicious. What’re you hiding?!
text_jp: 怪しいな　なにを隠している！

name: Search Soldier
text: We’re searching the shop right now.
text_jp: 現在　店内を捜査中だ

name: Search Soldier
text: Nobody goes inside!
text_jp: 誰も中に入るな！

name: Search Soldier
text: Sorry, but we need your cooperation.
text_jp:
申し訳ありませんが
ご協力をお願いします

name: Kalm Resident
text: What’s all this about, barging in like that?
text_jp: いきなり　なんなんですか？

name: Search Soldier
text: Quit talking back and show me your ID, now!
text_jp: 口答えせず　さっさと身分証を見せろ！

name: Broden
text: You’re the ones who took out Midgar’s mako reactor, right?
text_jp:
ミッドガルの魔晄炉をやったのは
君たちなんだろう？

name: Broden
text: I’m on your side. Got a friend in the main Avalanche group.
text_jp: 私は味方だ　本家に知り合いがいてね

name: Cloud
text: You’re with Avalanche too?
text_jp: あんたも　アバランチか

name: Broden
text: Something like that.
text_jp: 似たようなものだ

name: Broden
text: Wait!
text_jp: 待て！

name: Broden
text: I’ll draw the soldiers’ attention.
text_jp: 私が兵士の気を引こう

name: Broden
text: You guys cross the upper scaffolding.
text_jp: 君たちは　上の足場を渡れ

name: Broden
text: Something going on?
text_jp: なにか　あったんですか？

name: Search Soldier
text: We’re searching for fugitives.
text_jp: 逃亡犯の捜索中だ

name: Search Soldier
text: Seen anyone suspicious?
text_jp: 怪しいやつを見なかったか？

name: Broden
text: Oh, yeah, I might’ve seen someone…
text_jp: ああ　どこかで見たような

name: Broden
text:
No, wait, maybe not.
Or… maybe…
text_jp:
いや　あれは違うか
いやでも……

name: Search Soldier
text: Enough. Go home!
text_jp: もういい　家に帰れ！

name: Broden
text: Hold on a sec, I’m trying to remember… Uh…
text_jp:
ちょっと待ってください
いま思い出しますから　えっと……

name: Search Soldier
text: You’re in the way. Get lost!
text_jp: 捜索の邪魔だ　さっさと行け！

name: Search Soldier
text: Any sign of Avalanche?
text_jp: アバランチは居たか？

name: Search Soldier
text: We’re systematically searching the buildings.
text_jp: 順次　建物内を捜索中です

name: Search Soldier
text: Hurry up! Don’t let a single rat slip through!
text_jp: 急げ　ネズミ１匹逃すな！

name: Broden
text: Worked like a charm.
text_jp: うまくいったな

name: Broden
text: Almost back to the inn—don’t let your guard down.
text_jp: 宿まであと少し　気を抜くな

name: Aerith
text: What about everyone else?
text_jp: みんなは？

name: Broden
text: They’re waiting downstairs.
text_jp: 下で待っている

name: Broden
text:
There’s an underground passage leading out of town.
There shouldn’t be any ambushes yet.
text_jp:
地下道が街の外まで続いている
いまならまだ待ち伏せはないはずだ

name: Broden
text:
Once you’re out, head to a nearby farm.
A friend of mine there can help you.
text_jp:
外に出たら　近くの農場に
私の知人がいるから頼るといい

name: Broden
text: Oh, and…
text_jp: それと……

name: Broden
text: Take this.
text_jp: これを

name: Broden
text: It’s a crafting terminal.
text_jp: クラフト端末だ

name: Broden
text:
It’s an antique from the Republic era,
but it’ll let you do ‘Item Crafting.’
text_jp:
共和国時代に作られた骨董品だが
『アイテムクラフト』ができるようになる

name: Broden
text: Use it if you want.
text_jp: よければ　使ってくれ

name: Cloud
text: You’re letting us go—won’t you be in trouble?
text_jp: 俺たちを行かせて　あんたは大丈夫なのか

name: Broden
text: Me and this town have our own history with Shinra.
text_jp:
私も　この街も
神羅とは色々あってね

name: Broden
text: Honestly, I don’t know if this is the right path.
text_jp: 正直　これが正しい道なのかはわからん

name: Broden
text: Get going before I change my mind.
text_jp: 考えが変わる前に　さっさと行ってくれ

name: NPC
text: Would you like to check the ‘Item Crafting’ tutorial?
text_jp: 『アイテムクラフト』のチュートリアルを確認しますか？

name: NPC
text: Yes
text_jp: はい

name: NPC
text: No
text_jp: いいえ

name: Broden
text: Ugh…
text_jp: うう……

name: Broden
text: *cough* *cough*…
text_jp: ゲホッゲホ……

name: Broden
text: You shouldn’t come near this town for a while.
text_jp: しばらくは　この街に近づかないほうがいい

name: Broden
text:
I’ll let the farm guy know.
Stop by there.
text_jp:
農場のヤツには連絡しておく
寄ってみてくれ

name: Broden
text: Good luck.
text_jp: 幸運を祈るよ

name: Tifa
text: Thank goodness, you’re safe.
text_jp: よかった　無事だったんだ

name: Aerith
text: Sorry~!
text_jp: ごめ～ん！

name: Barret
text: Man, what the hell were you two up to?
text_jp: ったく　ふたりでなにしてやがったんだ

name: Aerith
text: A date, kinda?
text_jp: デート　みたいな？

name: Barret
text: That kinda stuff’s on hold for now.
text_jp: そういうのは　しばらくおあずけだ

name: Barret
text: Got it?!
text_jp: いいな！

name: Barret
text: Alright, let’s get outta here!
text_jp: よし　脱出だ

name: Tifa
text: A dead end?
text_jp: 行き止まり？

name: Red XIII
text: I feel a breeze. This way.
text_jp: 風が流れている　こっちだ

name: Barret
text: Looks like it’s my time to shine!
text_jp: オレの出番だな

name: Aerith
text: The planet…
text_jp: 星って

name: Aerith
text: It’s alive.
text_jp: 生きてるんだ

name: Aerith
text: I realized it all over again.
text_jp: あらためて　そう思った

name: Aerith
text: And it feels way stronger than me.
text_jp: それに　わたしなんかより　ずっと強そう

name: Red XIII
text: That’s just how it looks.
text_jp: そう見えるだけだ

name: Red XIII
text: That’s why people don’t notice the signs of collapse.
text_jp: だから人々は　崩壊の予兆に気づかない

name: Aerith
text: Teach me lots of stuff, okay?
text_jp: いろいろ　教えてね

name: Barret
text: What d’you wanna know?
text_jp: なにが知りたいんだ？

name: Aerith
text: Hmm, like…
text_jp: うーん　たとえば

name: Aerith
text: How to walk in the wastelands?
text_jp: 荒野の　歩き方？

name: Barret
text: That’s easy!
text_jp: そんなの　簡単だぜ

name: Barret
text: My way’s simple—
text_jp: オレのやり方は

name: Barret
text: Just start walkin’!
text_jp: とりあえず　歩き出せー！

name: Tifa
text: We won’t be able to come back to Kalm for a while, huh?
text_jp: カームには　しばらく戻れないよね

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: そうだな

name: Cloud
text: Let’s go.
text_jp: 行こう

name: Aerith
text: This is the real beginning, isn’t it?
text_jp: これが本当のはじまり　だね

name: Red XIII
text: Looking forward to it.
text_jp: よろしくな

name: Barret
text: Hell yeah!
text_jp: おっしゃあ

name: Barret
text: Let’s go, let’s go, let’s go, let’s GO!
text_jp: 行くぜ　行くぜ　行くぜ　行くぜー！

name: Barret
text: You know what that pipe is?
text_jp: おまえ　あのパイプがなにか知ってるか？

name: Cloud
text: A mako pipe.
text_jp: 魔晄パイプ

name: Cloud
text: It’s for transporting mako pumped in Midgar to other towns.
text_jp:
ミッドガルで汲み上げた魔晄を
ほかの街へ　輸送するためのものだ

name: Barret
text:
What’s flowin’ through that pipe is the planet’s lifeblood.
It ain’t somethin’ to be used for profit!
text_jp:
あのパイプん中を流れてんのは　星の命だ
金儲けに使っていいもんじゃねえ

name: Barret
text: I’m gonna smash it to bits someday!
text_jp: あれも　いつかぶっ壊してやる

name: Barret
text: That’s it!
text_jp: そうだ！

name: Barret
text:
How about we bend that pipe and shove it into the ground?
Give the mako back to the planet!
text_jp:
パイプをひん曲げて　地面に突っ込んでよ
魔晄を星に返すってのはどうだ？

name: Red XIII
text: That’s a fine idea.
text_jp: それは　名案だな

name: Cloud
text: Yeah, good plan.
text_jp: ああ　名案だ

name: Aerith
text: Sounds neat?
text_jp: いいかも？

name: Tifa
text: Let’s keep that in mind.
text_jp: 覚えておこう

name: Barret
text: You guys!
text_jp: おまえらー！

name: Aerith
text: The road’s full of cracks, huh?
text_jp: 道路　ヒビだらけだね

name: Red XIII
text:
It’s an old road from the Republic era.
Without maintenance, this is what happens.
text_jp:
共和国時代に作られた　古い道だ
整備をしなければ　こうなる

name: Barret
text: Shinra only fixes up the places they use themselves.
text_jp: 神羅は自分で使うとこしか　手入れしねえからな

name: Tifa
text: I heard buses used to run here way back when.
text_jp: 昔はバスが走ってたって　聞いたことがあるな

name: Red XIII
text: The buses disappeared along with the Republic.
text_jp: バスは　共和国と一緒になくなった

name: Barret
text: So basically, we’re stuck walkin’ ‘cause of Shinra.
text_jp:
つまり　オレたちが歩かされてんのは
神羅のせいってわけだ

name: Aerith
text:
But it’s fun!
Is this what hiking’s like?
text_jp:
でも　楽しい
ハイキングって　こんな感じ？

name: Cloud
text: Depends on how you look at it.
text_jp: 考え方次第だ

name: Tifa
text: Shinra weapons?
text_jp: 神羅の兵器？

name: Cloud
text: Yeah, but they’re pretty old.
text_jp: ああ　でも　かなり古いな

name: Barret
text: From back when they were sluggin’ it out with the Republic, right?
text_jp: 共和国と　ドンパチやってた頃のだろ？

name: Aerith
text: So they fought a war around here too, huh?
text_jp: このあたりでも　戦争したんだね

name: Barret
text: Go back far enough, this planet’s history is nothin’ but wars.
text_jp:
この星は　歴史をさかのぼりゃ
戦争ばっかりだぜ

name: Tifa
text: Is that a monster? Or an animal?
text_jp: あれはモンスター？　動物？

name: Cloud
text: An animal.
text_jp: 動物だ

name: Aerith
text: How can you tell?
text_jp: どうして　わかるの？

name: Cloud
text: It’s one of the basics you learn from the soldier handbook.
text_jp: 図鑑で覚える　兵士の基本のひとつだ

name: Red XIII
text:
Animals attack to eat or protect their territory.
Monsters don’t need a reason.
text_jp:
動物は食べるため　または縄張りを守るために襲う
だが　モンスターには理由がない

name: Cloud
text: Figuring it out after it attacks is too late.
text_jp: 襲われてからわかっても遅い

name: Red XIII
text:
In this case, it doesn’t smell dangerous.
Train your nose.
text_jp:
あれに関して言えば　危険なニオイはしない
鼻を鍛えるんだな

name: Barret
text: Shinra’s still hangin’ around, huh?
text_jp: まだ神羅がいやがるな

name: Red XIII
text: We should avoid going back for a while.
text_jp: しばらくは　戻らないほうがいいだろう

name: Tifa
text: Are they looking for us?
text_jp: 私たちのこと　探してるのかな

name: Aerith
text: We caused some trouble, didn’t we?
text_jp: 迷惑　かけちゃったね

name: Barret
text: Headin’ there now’ll get us caught.
text_jp: いま行くと　捕まっちまうぞ

name: Red XIII
text: Let’s steer clear while Shinra’s around.
text_jp: 神羅がいるうちは近づかないでおこう

name: Tifa
text: Looks like we should hold off for now.
text_jp: いまは　やめといたほうがよさそう

name: Aerith
text: Shinra’s here, huh?
text_jp: 神羅　いるね

name: Farmer
text: You’re Avalanche, right?
text_jp: あんたら　アバランチだろ？

name: Farmer
text:
Don’t worry.
I got word from the innkeeper in Kalm.
text_jp:
心配するな
カームの宿屋から連絡があった

name: Farmer
text:
Shinra’s gearing up to hunt you down for real.
Even this place might not be safe soon.
text_jp:
神羅が本格的に　あんたらを探すらしい
ここも安全じゃないかもしれない

name: Farmer
text:
There’s an unused dock in the swamp.
Might be a good spot to lay low.
text_jp:
湿地帯のほうに使われていない船着き場がある
身を隠すには　いいかもしれないぞ

name: Farmer
text:
Sorry, but I can’t hide you here.
If you’re looking to disappear, the swamp dock’s your best bet.
text_jp:
悪いが　ここで匿うわけにはいかない
身を隠すなら湿地帯の船着き場がオススメだ

name: Farmer
text:
Monsters have been popping up more lately.
You folks watch yourselves.
text_jp:
最近　モンスターが増えてるんだ
あんたらも　気をつけるんだな

name: Truck Driver
text:
Well, well!
Looks like the whole crew’s here.
text_jp:
おやおや
こいつはみなさん　おそろいで

name: Aerith
text: Oh!
text_jp: あっ！

name: Aerith
text: The truck guy!
text_jp: トラックのおじさん

name: Tifa
text: Thanks for helping us out back then.
text_jp: あの時は　お世話になりました

name: Truck Driver
text: Aw, shucks. You ladies are welcome anytime.
text_jp:
な～に　お嬢さんたちなら
いつでも大歓迎さ

name: Truck Driver
text: Oh, right—haven’t introduced myself yet.
text_jp: おっと　自己紹介がまだだったな

name: Bill
text: Name’s Bill. Nice to meet ya.
text_jp: わたしはグリン　以後お見知りおきを

name: Bill
text:
Burke news today, though—the truck’s actin’ up.
Can’t give you a lift.
text_jp:
今日は　あいにく車の調子が悪くてね
乗せてやれないよ

name: Aerith
text: We’re fine today. Thanks, though!
text_jp: 今日は大丈夫　ありがとう

name: Cloud
text: Any quiet spots around here nobody goes to?
text_jp: このあたりで　人気のないところはないか

name: Bill
text: A quiet spot?
text_jp: 人気のないところ？

name: Bill
text: Well, young folks do get swept up in passion sometimes.
text_jp: まあ　若いうちは情熱に流されるものだからな

name: Bill
text:
Hmm, the dock in the swamp’s got no one around.
It’s quiet—perfect fit, I’d say.
text_jp:
そうだな　湿地帯にある船着き場なら
誰もいないし静かだし　バッチリだと思うぞ

name: Bill
text: Swing by my ranch later if you’d like.
text_jp: よければ　あとでうちの牧場にも寄ってくれ

name: Bill
text: Sorry, got my hands full right now.
text_jp: いまは手が離せないんだ　すまんね

name: Bill
text:
Almost made it to the ranch,
but this junker’s actin’ up again.
text_jp:
もう少しで牧場だっていうのに
このオンボロめ

name: Barret
text: No Shinra around here.
text_jp: 神羅は　いねえな

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: ああ

name: Red XIII
text: A dock from the Republic era.
text_jp: 共和国時代の船着き場だ

name: Barret
text: Back in the day, they crossed the swamp by boat, right?
text_jp: 昔は　船で湿地を渡ってたんだよな

name: Barret
text: Then through the Mythril Mines to Junon.
text_jp:
で　ミスリルマインを抜ければ
ジュノンってわけだ

name: Cloud
text: Yep, that’s right.
text_jp: ああ　そのとおりだ

name: Red XIII
text: But the boat’s dead.
text_jp: だが　船は死んでいる

name: Aerith
text: Wanna try riding it?
text_jp: 乗って　みる？

name: Cloud
text: No chance.
text_jp: 無理だな

name: Barret
text: Then we swim!
text_jp: そんじゃあ　泳ぐか！

name: Tifa
text: ‘The swamp’s home to the Midgardsormr.’
text_jp: 『湿地には　ミドガルズオルムが潜んでいます』

name: Tifa
text: …Or so they say.
text_jp: ……だって

name: Aerith
text: But with a chocobo’s speed, we’d be fine!
text_jp: でも　チョコボのスピードなら大丈夫

name: Aerith
text: Come on, let’s cross the swamp with chocobos!
text_jp: さあ　チョコボで湿地を越えましょう

name: Tifa
text: ‘For all your chocobo needs, visit Bill’s Ranch!’
text_jp: チョコボのご用命は　グリン牧場まで

name: Tifa
text: That’s the word!
text_jp: だって！

name: Aerith
text: What do we do?
text_jp: どうする？

name: Aerith
text: Ride chocobos?
text_jp: チョコボ　乗る？

name: Tifa
text: Wanna ride?
text_jp: 乗る？

name: Cloud
text: Let’s check it out.
text_jp: 行ってみよう

name: Barret
text: Ain’t we takin’ chocobos?
text_jp: チョコボで行くんじゃねえのか

name: Red XIII
text: Going on foot’s too dangerous.
text_jp: 徒歩で行くのは　危険だ

name: Tifa
text: We need to get some chocobos.
text_jp: チョコボを手に入れないと

name: Aerith
text: Not riding chocobos?
text_jp: チョコボ　乗らないの？

name: Rancher
text:
Well, well!
Looks like the whole crew’s here.
text_jp:
おやおや
こいつはみなさん　おそろいで

name: Aerith
text: Oh!
text_jp: あっ！

name: Aerith
text: The truck guy!
text_jp: トラックのおじさん

name: Tifa
text: Thanks for helping us out back then.
text_jp: あの時は　お世話になりました

name: Rancher
text: Aw, shucks. You ladies are welcome anytime.
text_jp:
な～に　お嬢さんたちなら
いつでも大歓迎さ

name: Rancher
text: Oh, right—haven’t introduced myself yet.
text_jp: おっと　自己紹介がまだだったな

name: Bill
text: Name’s Bill. Nice to meet ya.
text_jp: わたしはグリン　以後お見知りおきを

name: Bill
text:
Well, well, everyone!
Welcome to Bill’s Ranch!
text_jp:
これはこれは　みなさん
ようこそ　グリン牧場へ

name: Aerith
text: Did you fix the truck?
text_jp: トラック　直った？

name: Bill
text:
Guess it perked up after seein’ you ladies.
It’s runnin’ again somehow.
text_jp:
お嬢さんたちと会って元気になったのか
なんとか　動いてくれたよ

name: Bill
text:
So, what’s up today?
Need some chocobos, maybe?
text_jp:
今日は？
もしかして　チョコボが入り用かな

name: Barret
text: Damn right! Gotta cross that swamp.
text_jp: おうよ　湿地帯を越えたくてよ

name: Bill
text: Good eye!
text_jp: さすが　お目が高い

name: Bill
text:
Back in the day, there was a state-run transport system,
but as you know, it’s useless now.
text_jp:
昔は国営の交通網があったが
ご存知のとおり　いまじゃまったくの役立たず

name: Bill
text: That’s where chocobos come in handy!
text_jp: そんな時代に便利なのが　チョコボ！

name: Bill
text: Especially in the swamp—they’re unbeatable.
text_jp: 特に湿地帯では　この上なく役に立つ

name: Bill
text: Ladies!
text_jp: お嬢さんがた

name: Bill
text: D’you know how chocobos cross bottomless swamps?
text_jp:
チョコボが　どうやって
底なし沼を渡るか知ってますかな？

name: Tifa & Aerith
text: Um…?
text_jp: さあ……？

name: Bill
text:
Believe it or not, they float with their feathers
and swim across with those tough legs—zippy as can be!
text_jp:
なんと　羽毛でプカプカと浮かびながら
強靭な脚で　スイスイ～っと泳ぐんですな

name: Bill
text:
And even that fearsome Midgardsormr
can’t catch up to a chocobo!
text_jp:
そして　あの恐ろしいミドガルズオルムも
チョコボには追いつけないときたもんだ

name: Bill
text: So, what I’m tryin’ to say is…
text_jp: まあ　なにが言いたいかというと

name: Bill
text: If you’re crossin’ the swamp, chocobos are the best way to go!
text_jp: 湿地帯を越えるなら　チョコボが最善！

name: Bill
text: No doubt about it!
text_jp: それはもう　間違いなし

name: Cloud
text: Can we rent one here?
text_jp: ここで借りられるのか？

name: Bill
text: ‘Course you can!
text_jp: もちろん

name: Bill
text:
Talk to my grandson Billy over at that shed
for the details.
text_jp:
詳しいことは　あの小屋にいる
孫のグリングリンに聞いてくれ

name: Bill
text: Got any questions?
text_jp: なにか　質問かな？

name: NPC
text: Got any questions?
text_jp: なにか　質問かな？

name: NPC
text: About the Midgardsormr
text_jp: ミドガルズオルムについて

name: NPC
text: About chocobos
text_jp: チョコボについて

name: NPC
text: No questions
text_jp: 質問はない

name: Bill
text:
The Midgardsormr’s a monstrous snake livin’ in the swamp,
over ten meters long.
text_jp:
ミドガルズオルムとは　湿地帯に棲む
身の丈１０メートルを超える怪物的ヘビのことだな

name: Bill
text:
It senses people or animals wanderin’ into the swamp,
sneaks up all quiet-like, and snaps ‘em up!
text_jp:
湿地帯に入り込んだ人や動物の気配を察知しては
音もなく忍び寄り　バクッと襲いかかるわけだ

name: Bill
text:
But even somethin’ like that
can’t keep up with a chocobo’s speed.
text_jp:
そんなやつらも
チョコボのスピードには追いつけない

name: Bill
text:
That’s a bit of trivia
any seasoned traveler knows.
text_jp:
これ　経験豊かな旅人なら
だれでも知ってる豆知識

name: Bill
text: You’ve got the face of someone who already knew that, huh?
text_jp: おまえさんは　当然知ってるって顔だな

name: Bill
text: Right?
text_jp: だろう？

name: Bill
text:
I’ve got a good eye for chocobos and people,
if I do say so myself.
text_jp:
わたしは　チョコボと人を見る目には
自信があるんだ

name: Bill
text: The Midgardsormr’s a snake monster livin’ in the swamp.
text_jp:
ミドガルズオルムは湿地帯に生息する
ヘビのバケモノだよ

name: Bill
text:
To avoid gettin’ attacked by ‘em,
chocobos are your best bet.
text_jp:
彼らに襲われないためにも
チョコボが最善の選択ってわけだ

name: Bill
text:
Ask Billy at the chocobo shed
if you want more details.
text_jp:
詳しいことは　チョコボ小屋にいる
グリングリンに聞いてくれ

name: Bill
text:
Oh, you’re gonna catch that runaway chocobo for me?
I’m countin’ on ya!
text_jp:
おお　逃げたチョコボを捕まえてくれるんだって？
頼んだよ

name: Bill
text:
Might as well check on the signs
while the truck’s runnin’ smooth.
text_jp:
トラックの調子がいいうちに
看板の点検に行っとくかな

name: Bill
text:
Heard Shinra’s locked down Kalm.
You folks know anything about that?
text_jp:
神羅軍が　カームを封鎖してるらしい
おまえさんたち　なにか知ってるか？

name: Billy
text: Welcome!
text_jp: いらっしゃい！

name: Cloud
text:
Saw your sign.
We wanna rent a chocobo for the swamp.
text_jp:
看板を見た
湿地帯用のチョコボを借りたい

name: Billy
text: Aw, you old-timers are outta luck.
text_jp: あ～　おじさんたち　運が悪い

name: Cloud
text: Old…?
text_jp: おじ……

name: Billy
text: All the rental chocobos are out right now.
text_jp: レンタル用のチョコボは　みんな貸し出し中なんだ

name: Barret
text: But there’s a bunch right there!
text_jp: いっぱい　いるじゃねえか

name: Billy
text: Those are either recoverin’ or already booked.
text_jp: いまいるのは療養中か　契約済みの子だよ

name: Billy
text: But, well…
text_jp: でも　まあ

name: Billy
text:
If you old-timers wanna pay a premium,
I could let you have one.
text_jp:
おじさんたちが　もっと高値で借りてくれる
って言うなら　譲ってもいいよ

name: Barret
text: How much?
text_jp: いくらだよ

name: Billy
text: Over 100,000 gil.
text_jp: １０万以上

name: Aerith
text: Sorry…
text_jp: ごめんね

name: Aerith
text: We’re just travelers—we can’t pay that much.
text_jp: わたしたち　旅の途中で　そんなに払えないの

name: Billy
text: Well, I’ve got some good info then.
text_jp: それなら　いい情報があるんだ

name: Billy
text: Info fee’s 1,000 gil.
text_jp: 情報料　１０００ギル

name: Billy
text: Or so I’d like to say,
text_jp: と　言いたいところだけど

name: Billy
text: But I don’t wanna trouble a pretty lady, so it’s free.
text_jp: 美人を困らせたくないから　タダでいいや

name: Billy
text:
Truth is, a while back, a chocobo escaped the ranch
and went wild.
text_jp:
実は　すこし前に牧場から逃げだして
そのまま野生化しちゃったチョコボがいるんだ

name: Billy
text:
If you can catch it,
you ladies can keep it.
text_jp:
もし　そいつを捕まえてくれたら
お姉さんたちのものにしていいよ

name: Aerith
text: Really?
text_jp: ほんとに？

name: Billy
text: Its name’s Piko.
text_jp: 名前は『ピコ』

name: Billy
text:
Bit of a stubborn one.
It slipped away while we were grazin’ it.
text_jp:
ちょっと気難しいヤツで
放牧してたら　いつの間にか逃げちゃったんだ

name: Billy
text: Might take after that old-timer over there.
text_jp: おじさんに　雰囲気が似てるかも

name: Billy
text: First, look for Piko’s tracks.
text_jp: まず　ピコの足あとを探して

name: Billy
text: If you find tracks, it’ll be nearby.
text_jp: 足あとがあれば　その近くにいるはずだよ

name: Billy
text: Wild chocobos are real skittish,
text_jp: 野良になったチョコボは　すごく用心深いけど

name: Billy
text:
But if you can sneak up without it noticin’,
even you ladies should be able to catch it.
text_jp:
気づかれないように近づければ
お姉さんたちでも　捕まえられると思うな

name: Aerith
text: Got it. Thanks!
text_jp: うん　わかった　ありがとう

name: Billy
text: Oh, and this is important—
text_jp: あと　これ重要

name: Billy
text:
Since I gave you the info for free,
you’ve gotta shop at our store.
text_jp:
情報をタダにしたんだ
必ず　うちの店で買い物をすること

name: Billy
text: My little sis Chloe’s runnin’ it, so check it out first.
text_jp: 妹のクリンが売ってるから　まずは見てってよ

name: Barret
text: Kid’s got a knack for business!
text_jp: 商売がうめえな

name: Billy
text:
Once you catch the chocobo,
bring it back here.
text_jp:
チョコボを捕まえたら
いちど　うちに連れてくるといいよ

name: Billy
text: I’ll teach you how to ride and care for it.
text_jp: 乗り方や育て方を　教えてあげる

name: Billy
text: Check out Chloe’s shop!
text_jp: クリンのお店　見てってよ

name: Billy
text: No gil? Just browsin’s fine too!
text_jp: お金ないなら　見るだけでもいいからさ

name: Billy
text: Chocobo questions?
text_jp: チョコボの質問？

name: NPC
text: Chocobo questions?
text_jp: チョコボの質問？

name: NPC
text: Where to find chocobos
text_jp: チョコボがいる場所について

name: NPC
text: How to catch chocobos
text_jp: チョコボの捕まえ方について

name: NPC
text: About chocobo gear
text_jp: チョコボの装具品について

name: NPC
text: No questions
text_jp: 質問はない

name: Billy
text:
Head outside and look for chocobo tracks first.
It’ll be around there, for sure.
text_jp:
外に出たら　まずチョコボの足あとを探すんだ
そのあたりにいるよ　きっと

name: Billy
text: Wild chocobos are super wary,
text_jp: 野生化したチョコボは　警戒心が強いからね

name: Billy
text:
So the trick is to sneak up
without it noticin’.
text_jp:
気づかれないように
こっそり近づくのがコツだよ

name: Billy
text: Take care of Piko for me!
text_jp: ピコのこと　よろしく頼むよ

name: Billy
text:
You can deck out chocobos with gear to make ‘em look cool
or boost their racin’ stats.
text_jp:
チョコボに装具品をつけることで　格好よくしたり
チョコボレースの能力をパワーアップできるんだ

name: Billy
text:
We trade ‘em for ‘Golden Feathers,’
so keep that in mind!
text_jp:
『黄金の羽根』と交換してるから
そっちもよろしくね

name: Chloe
text: Sorry my brother’s all about gil, gil, gil.
text_jp: お兄ちゃんが　お金お金ってごめんなさい

name: Aerith
text: It’s his job, so don’t worry about it!
text_jp: お仕事だからね　気にしないで

name: Chloe
text:
Yeah, but ever since Mom and Dad passed,
he’s gotten real stingy about money.
text_jp:
そうなんだけど　パパとママがいなくなってから
とってもお金にうるさくなって

name: Chloe
text: Big sis, you from Midgar?
text_jp: お姉さん　ミッドガルから来たの？

name: Aerith
text: Yup, from the slums!
text_jp: うん　スラムから

name: Chloe
text: Do you know Chocobo Sam?
text_jp: チョコボ・サムって　知ってる？

name: Aerith
text:
Know him? Well…
Yeah, I know him.
text_jp:
知ってるっていうか……
うん　知ってる

name: Chloe
text: Where’s he at?
text_jp: どこにいるの？

name: Cloud
text: Probably Sector 6 slums.
text_jp: 六番街のスラムだろうな

name: Cloud
text: Wall—
text_jp: ウォール――

name: Aerith
text: You wanna meet Sam?
text_jp: サムに　会いたいの？

name: Chloe
text: Hmm, I dunno.
text_jp: う～ん　わかんない

name: Chloe
text: That guy’s Mom and Dad’s ‟enemy.”
text_jp: その人　パパとママの“かたき”なの

name: Billy
text: Chloe, we don’t talk about that with customers.
text_jp: クリン　その話はお客さんにはしないよ

name: Chloe
text: But…
text_jp: でも……

name: Billy
text: Don’t go spreadin’ that story around, got it?
text_jp: いまの話は　よそでしないでよね

name: Billy
text:
Sam’s a big shot in the chocobo biz.
Burke rumors could crush us in no time.
text_jp:
サムはチョコボ業界の大物だから
変な噂が立ったら　うちなんかすぐに潰されちゃう

name: Aerith
text: Got it. I won’t tell a soul!
text_jp: うん　わかった　だれにも言わない

name: Chloe
text:
When you catch Piko,
try giving it these veggies.
text_jp:
ピコを捕まえたら
この野菜　あげてみてください

name: Chloe
text:
Piko really loved veggies,
so it might wanna come back here.
text_jp:
ピコは　特に野菜が好きだったから
ここに戻ってきたくなると思うんです

name: Chloe
text: Well, take a look around the shop too!
text_jp: それじゃ　お店も見ていってください

name: Chloe
text:
Big bro said you HAVE to buy somethin’,
but only if you find somethin’ good, okay?
text_jp:
お兄ちゃんは　必ず買えなんて言ってたけど
いいものがあったらでいいんで　買ってください

name: Chloe
text:
Oh, and we handle chocobo gear
and ‘Golden Feather’ trades too!
text_jp:
あと　チョコボの装具品と
『黄金の羽根』の交換も受け付けてるんで

name: Chloe
text: Hope you’ll check that out!
text_jp: そちらも　よろしくお願いします

name: Chloe
text: Take care of Piko for me!
text_jp: ピコのこと　よろしくお願いします

name: Chloe
text: Leave all your chocobo needs to us!
text_jp: チョコボのことは　うちにおまかせください

name: Chloe
text: Welcome!
text_jp: いらっしゃいませ

name: Chloe
text: What’ll it be today?
text_jp: 今日は　どれにします？

name: Chloe
text: Thank you!
text_jp: ありがとうございました

name: Chloe
text: Come back anytime!
text_jp: また来てくださいね

name: Chloe
text: Drop by whenever you like!
text_jp: いつでも　遊びにきてくださいね

name: Chloe
text:
When you wanna change your chocobo’s gear,
use the ‘Choco Shack’ over there!
text_jp:
チョコボをお着替えさせるときは
そこの『チョコ房』を使ってください

name: Barret
text: Alright, let’s go huntin’ for that chocobo!
text_jp: そんじゃあ　チョコボ探しといくか

name: Aerith
text: Name’s Piko!
text_jp: 名前は　ピコ！

name: Tifa
text: Tracks first, right?
text_jp: まず　足あとだよね

name: Cloud
text: There it is.
text_jp: いたぞ

name: Barret
text:
Hell yeah!
Now we just gotta nab it!
text_jp:
よっしゃあ！
あとは　とっ捕まえるだけだな

name: Cloud
text: Quietly. The basics of hunting are not lettin’ it notice you.
text_jp: 静かに　狩りの基本は相手に気づかせないことだ

name: Aerith
text: Hunting? We’re gonna be friends, right?
text_jp: 狩り？　友達になるんだよね

name: Cloud
text: Uh… yeah.
text_jp: ああ……

name: Piko
text: Kweh! Kweh~!
text_jp: クエ　クエ～！

name: Aerith
text: So cute~!
text_jp: かわいい～

name: Aerith
text: It does kinda look like him, huh?
text_jp: たしかに　似てるかも

name: Barret
text: What’s up? Somethin’ wrong?
text_jp: なんだ　どうした？

name: Aerith
text: Maybe it’s still hungry?
text_jp: まだ　おなか減ってるのかも

name: Tifa
text: Sorry, we don’t have any more.
text_jp: ごめんね　もう持ってないの

name: Piko
text: Kweh…
text_jp: クエ……

name: Aerith
text: There’s tons back at the ranch!
text_jp: 牧場に戻れば　たくさんあるよ

name: Piko
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエ！

name: Red XIII
text: Looks like it’s headin’ back to the ranch.
text_jp: 牧場へ戻るようだな

name: Aerith
text: Let’s follow it!
text_jp: 追いかけよ

name: Aerith
text: There it is!
text_jp: いたいた！

name: Aerith
text: Did the veggies remind you of home?
text_jp: 野菜で　おうちのこと　思い出した？

name: Billy
text: Yup, no injuries—it’s fine.
text_jp: うん　ケガもしてないし大丈夫だね

name: Billy
text: If anything, it’s lookin’ sturdier!
text_jp: むしろ　たくましくなってる

name: Cloud
text: Can we ride it?
text_jp: 乗れそうか？

name: Billy
text: Not yet—it’s too riled up from hunger.
text_jp: いまは空腹で気が立ってるから　無理かな

name: Billy
text:
But once it eats and calms down,
it should be good to go.
text_jp:
でも　しっかり食べて
気持ちが落ちつけば　大丈夫だと思う

name: Billy
text:
I’ll get it ready for ridin’,
so wait outside ‘til then.
text_jp:
乗れるように準備しておくから
それまで　外で待っててよ

name: Billy
text:
Piko gets antsy with people around,
so wait outside, okay?
text_jp:
人がいると　ピコが落ちつかないから
外で待っててよ

name: Billy
text: Might take a little longer.
text_jp: もう少し　かかりそうかな

name: Chloe
text: Thanks so much for bringing Piko back!
text_jp: ピコを連れ戻してくれて　ありがとうございます

text: Cloud!
text_jp: クラウドさん！

name: Cloud
text: You’re…
text_jp: おまえは……

name: Chadley
text: It’s me, Chadley!
text_jp: ボクです　チャドリーです！

name: Chadley
text:
Wait…
Did you forget me?
text_jp:
あれ……
もしかして　お忘れですか？

name: NPC
text: Did you forget me?
text_jp: もしかして　お忘れですか？

name: NPC
text: I don’t remember
text_jp: 覚えていない

name: NPC
text: Of course I remember
text_jp: もちろん覚えている

name: Cloud
text: Sorry.
text_jp: すまない

name: Chadley
text: Oh… I see.
text_jp: そう……ですか

name: Chadley
text:
To you, Cloud,
I guess I’m just that insignificant.
text_jp:
クラウドさんにとって
ボクなんて　その程度の存在なのですね

name: Chadley
text: That’s a shame.
text_jp: 残念です

name: Chadley
text: Well, let me reintroduce myself then.
text_jp: では　あらためて自己紹介させてください

name: Chadley
text: My name’s Chadley.
text_jp: ボクの名前は　チャドリー

name: Chadley
text: I was researching materia back in Midgar.
text_jp: ミッドガルで　マテリアの研究をしていた者です

name: Chadley
text:
We met in the slums, Cloud, and I asked you
to submit battle reports for my research.
text_jp:
クラウドさんとはスラムで出会い　研究に必要な
バトルレポートの提出をお願いしました

name: Chadley
text:
We talked a bunch in Midgar,
and you helped me out a ton.
text_jp:
ミッドガルでは　何度となくお話をし
とてもよくしてもらったのですが

name: Chadley
text: So, does that jog your memory a bit?
text_jp: どうでしょう　すこしは思い出されましたか？

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: ああ

name: Chadley
text: Good. I’m glad!
text_jp: よかった　うれしいです

name: Chadley
text: Phew, great!
text_jp: よかった！

name: Chadley
text: Thanks for all those battle reports in Midgar.
text_jp:
ミッドガルでは　数々のバトルレポートの提出
ありがとうございました

name: Chadley
text: They helped me craft a ton of materia!
text_jp:
おかげさまで　たくさんのマテリアを
生成することができました

name: Chadley
text: Detecting confusion: ‘Why’re you out here?’
text_jp:
どうしておまえがこんなところに？
という　困惑を検知

name: Chadley
text: I’m a cyborg built by Hojo, y’know.
text_jp: ボクは　宝条によって造られたサイボーグですよ

name: Chadley
text: Reading your emotions is a piece of cake for me.
text_jp:
クラウドさんの感情を読み取ることぐらい
簡単です

name: Chadley
text:
Truth is, I took a page outta your book, Cloud,
and left Midgar behind.
text_jp:
実は　ボクもクラウドさんたちを見習って
ミッドガルから飛び出し

name: Chadley
text: Decided to see the world for myself!
text_jp: 世界中を見てまわることにしたんです

name: Chadley
text:
So, I’ve got a little favor
to ask you, Cloud.
text_jp:
そこで　折り入って
クラウドさんにお願いしたいことがあるのですが

name: Cloud
text: Battle data collection?
text_jp: 戦闘データの収集か

name: Chadley
text: You catch on quick, Cloud!
text_jp: さすがクラウドさん　話が早いですね

name: Chadley
text:
But first,
I need you to activate a ‘comm tower.’
text_jp:
でも　その前に
『通信塔』を起動していただきたいんです

name: Chadley
text:
The Junon Republic built these towers all over,
then Shinra took ‘em over.
text_jp:
かつて　ジュノン共和国が世界中に建設した
通信塔を　神羅が接収したのですが

name: Chadley
text: But they’ve been sittin’ there, abandoned.
text_jp: そのまま使われることなく　放置されてるんです

name: Chadley
text: So I figured, why not make ‘em mine?
text_jp: だったら　ボクのものにしてもいいかなって

name: Chadley
text: Each tower I activate boosts my processing power,
text_jp:
各地にある通信塔を起動していくごとに
ボクの演算処理能力が強化され

name: Chadley
text: And lets me expand my search range.
text_jp: 探索領域を広げることができます

name: Chadley
text:
Plus, I could build a comms network
free from Shinra’s control.
text_jp:
また　神羅に関与されない通信網を
構築することだって可能です

name: Chadley
text:
What do you think?
Could be useful for you too, Cloud!
text_jp:
いかがでしょう？
クラウドさんにとっても　有益かと思うのですが

name: Cloud
text: I’ll activate any I find.
text_jp: 見つけたら　起動しておこう

name: Chadley
text: I knew you’d say that, Cloud!
text_jp:
クラウドさんなら
そう言ってくれると信じていました

name: Chadley
text:
So, how about startin’ with
that tower over there?
text_jp:
では　早速ですが
あそこにある通信塔の起動をお願いします

name: Chadley
text: Here’s the activation module.
text_jp: これが　起動モジュールです

name: Chadley
text: I’ll guide you this time!
text_jp: それでは　今回はボクがご案内しますね

name: Chadley
text: Cloud, over here!
text_jp: クラウドさん　こっちですよ？

name: Chadley
text: Stick with me, okay?
text_jp: しっかり　ついてきてください！

name: Chadley
text: Right this way!
text_jp: こちらです

name: Chadley
text: Comm tower activation confirmed!
text_jp: 通信塔の起動を確認！

name: Chadley
text: Starting exploration of the Grasslands area now.
text_jp: 早速　グラスランドエリアの探索を開始し

name: Chadley
text:
Mapping out monster habitats
and harvestable materials.
text_jp:
モンスターの生息地
採取可能な素材などを割り出しています

name: Bill
text:
You folks
headin’ to the swamp next, right?
text_jp:
おまえさんたち
これから　湿地帯へ行くんだろ？

name: Aerith
text: Yup, that’s the plan!
text_jp: うん　そのつもり

name: Bill
text: Just a bit ago, I was checkin’ the signs,
text_jp: ついさっき　看板を点検しとったら

name: Bill
text:
And saw some folks in black cloaks
stumblin’ into the swamp.
text_jp:
黒いマントを着た連中が
ふらふら～っと　湿地帯へ入っていくのを見てな

name: Cloud
text: Black cloaks?
text_jp: 黒マント？

name: Bill
text:
Told ‘em it’s dangerous without a chocobo,
but off they went anyway.
text_jp:
チョコボに乗らんと危ないぞ～と言ったんだが
行っちまいおった

name: Bill
text:
At this rate,
they’ll end up Midgardsormr chow.
text_jp:
あのままだと
ミドガルズオルムのエサになっちまう

name: Bill
text:
If you spot ‘em, mind tellin’ ‘em
to swing by here?
text_jp:
もし見かけたら　うちに寄るよう
声をかけてくれんか

name: Bill
text:
There’s a chocobo ranch on the Junon side
run by an old buddy of mine—stop by if you can!
text_jp:
ジュノン側に　古い友がやってる
チョコボ牧場があるから良ければ寄ってやってくれ

name: Bill
text: Hop on a chocobo, and the world opens right up!
text_jp: チョコボにまたがれば　世界がグーンと広がるぞ！

name: Red XIII
text:
If we’re crossing the swamp,
we should call the chocobos.
text_jp:
湿地を渡るなら
チョコボを呼んだほうがいい

name: Barret
text: They can really get us across, huh?
text_jp: 本当に渡れんだろうな？

name: Barret
text:
Heard there’s bottomless pits out there,
plus that snake monster, right?
text_jp:
底なし沼もあるって話じゃねえか
それに　ヘビのバケモンも出るんだろ？

name: Tifa
text: They said chocobos’ll handle it,
text_jp: チョコボなら大丈夫って言ってたけど

name: Aerith
text: Let’s trust these little guys!
text_jp: この子たち　信じよ

name: Piko
text: Kweh~!
text_jp: クエ～！

name: Cloud
text: Look over there.
text_jp: あれを見ろ

name: Cloud
text: It’s Sephiroth.
text_jp: セフィロスだ

name: Tifa
text: Really?
text_jp: ほんと？

name: Cloud
text: Let’s follow him.
text_jp: 追うぞ

name: Barret
text: Sephiroth ain’t here.
text_jp: セフィロス　いねえな

name: Tifa
text: Yeah, you’re right…
text_jp: うん　そうだね……

name: Aerith
text: I can see the goal up ahead!
text_jp: ゴール　見えてきたね

name: Cloud
text: Hurry up.
text_jp: 急ごう

name: Barret
text: Whoa, what’s goin’ on?!
text_jp: なんだ　どうした！

name: Tifa
text: What?!
text_jp: なにっ？

name: Barret
text: Hey, hey, hey, HEY, HEY!
text_jp: おいおいおいおいおい！

name: Red XIII
text: Looks like it was camouflaged as an island.
text_jp: 島に擬態していたようだな

name: Barret
text: Thanks for the play-by-play!
text_jp: 解説ありがとよ

name: Cloud
text: Here it comes!
text_jp: 来るぞ！

name: Cloud
text: Get back!
text_jp: 離れろ！

name: Aerith
text: Did it run off?
text_jp: 逃げた？

name: Tifa
text: Cloud!
text_jp: クラウド！

name: Aerith
text: No way…
text_jp: そんな……

text: Hellooo?
text_jp: もしもーし

name: Aerith
text: Do you know me?
text_jp: わたし　わかる？

name: Cloud
text: Aerith…
text_jp: エアリス……

name: Aerith
text: Welcome back, Cloud.
text_jp: おかえり　クラウド

name: Cloud
text: Where’s Sephiroth?
text_jp: セフィロスは？

name: Cloud
text: Guess Sephiroth’s as tough as ever.
text_jp: やっぱり　セフィロスは強いな

name: Cloud
text:
Those guys might be
chasing Sephiroth too.
text_jp:
あの連中も
セフィロスを追っているのかもしれない

name: Aerith
text: Yeah, it kinda feels that way.
text_jp: うん　そんな感じ　するね

name: Cloud
text: Let’s go after him.
text_jp: 俺たちも行こう

name: Red XIII
text: Is Sephiroth here?
text_jp: セフィロスがいるのか

name: Cloud
text: Not sure.
text_jp: わからない

name: Aerith
text: Looks like there might be monsters around.
text_jp: モンスター　いそうだね

name: Tifa
text: Sure does.
text_jp: いかにも

name: Cloud
text: Deal with small fry quick—don’t chase ‘em too far.
text_jp: ザコは適当にあしらう　深追いは禁物だ

name: Aerith
text: Small fry? There’s no such thing!
text_jp: ザコなんて　いないよ

name: Aerith
text: To me, they’re all tough!
text_jp: わたしには　ぜーんぶ強敵

name: Tifa
text: Me too.
text_jp: 私も

name: Barret
text: Same here!
text_jp: オレもだ

name: Barret
text: Cloud, do somethin’ about it!
text_jp: クラウド　なんとかしてくれ

name: Cloud
text: Guess I’m worth 2,000 then.

name: Aerith
text: Somewhere between ‟top-notch” and ‟average”?
text_jp: “極上”と“普通”の　あいだくらい？

name: Tifa
text: What’re we talking about?
text_jp: なんの話？

name: Aerith
text: Massages!
text_jp: もみ！

name: Tifa
text: Massages?
text_jp: もみ？

name: Cloud
text: Let’s move.
text_jp: 行くぞ

name: Cloud
text: Everyone, stay sharp.
text_jp: 各自　注意してくれ

name: Barret
text:
This place used to be a mythril mine.
You guys know what mythril is?
text_jp:
ここは元々　ミスリルを採ってたんだ
おまえら　ミスリルはわかるか？

name: Tifa
text: Uh… maybe I’ve heard of it?
text_jp: う～ん　聞いたことはあるかな

name: Cloud
text: Super tough.
text_jp: とても硬い

name: Red XIII
text: And beautiful.
text_jp: そして　美しい

name: Barret
text:
Both right!
Plus, it was crazy valuable.
text_jp:
ふたりとも正解だ
しかも　とんでもなく貴重だった

name: Barret
text: Never heard of it bein’ mined anywhere else.
text_jp: ここ以外で採れたって話は　聞いたことがねえ

name: Barret
text:
I worked in mines way back,
so I know a thing or two about this stuff.
text_jp:
オレは昔　鉱山で働いてたからよ
この業界は　ちーっとばかり詳しいぜ

name: Aerith
text: So, should we look for some mythril?
text_jp: じゃあ　ミスリル探す？

name: Barret
text: Wouldn’t recommend it.
text_jp: あんまり　オススメじゃあねえな

name: Barret
text: Shinra’s tech can whip up somethin’ similar now.
text_jp:
神羅の技術で　似たようなモノを
作れるようになったんだ

name: Barret
text: Something ridiculously hard and sparkly, huh?
text_jp: とてつもなく硬くて　キラキラしたモノをよ

name: Cloud
text: Probably an advanced form of Materia refining.
text_jp: マテリア精製の応用だろうな

name: Aerith
text: Ohh~ Really?
text_jp: へえ～　そうなんだ

name: Cloud
text: Maybe.
text_jp: たぶん

name: Aerith
text: Ah! Those people!
text_jp: あっ　あの人たち！

name: Red XIII
text: Looks like they’re heading deeper in.
text_jp: 奥へ向かっているようだ

name: Cloud
text: Let’s follow ‘em.
text_jp: 追うぞ

name: Tifa
text: I hope they’re okay.
text_jp: 無事だといいな

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: ああ

name: Cloud
text: But we shouldn’t get too involved.
text_jp: でも　深入りしないほうがいい

name: Tifa
text: Yeah…
text_jp: うん……

name: Barret
text: Right? Ya can’t help but wonder.
text_jp: だよな　気になるよな

name: Barret
text: Alright, I’m goin’ in!
text_jp: よし　オレが行く！

name: Tifa
text: Okay, I’ll go too.
text_jp: うん　私も行くね

name: Barret
text:
Nah, there’s a trick to movin’ around a place like this.
Ya gotta know how to handle it.
text_jp:
いや　こういう場所の歩き方には
ちょっとしたコツがいる

name: Barret
text: Sorry, but amateurs’ll just slow me down.
text_jp: 素人は　悪いが足手まといだ

name: Red XIII
text: I’ll go too.
text_jp: 私も行こう

name: Red XIII
text: I’ve got some experience with this.
text_jp: 多少　心得がある

name: Tifa
text: Then please, go. Sorry about this.
text_jp: じゃあ　お願い　ごめんね

name: Tifa
text: No, thank you.
text_jp: ううん　ありがとう

name: Barret
text: Don’t lose sight of the other black cloaks!
text_jp: ほかの黒マント　見失うなよ

name: Aerith
text: Be careful, okay~!
text_jp: 気をつけてね～！

name: Aerith
text: Wow~ It’s huge!
text_jp: うわ～　ひろ～い！

name: Tifa
text: That building…
text_jp: あの建物

name: Cloud
text: Might connect all the way to the exit.
text_jp: 出口まで　つながっているのかもな

name: Aerith
text: Let’s check it out!
text_jp: 行ってみよう

name: Aerith
text: We lost track of the black-cloaked people, huh?
text_jp: 黒マントの人たち　見失っちゃったね

name: Cloud
text: We can catch up anytime.
text_jp: いつでも追いつける

name: Tifa
text: I just hope they didn’t fall or anything.
text_jp: また　落ちたりしてなきゃいいけど

text: How’s Reno-senpai doing?
text_jp: レノ先輩の様子　どうなんですか？

text: His injuries aren’t that bad.
text_jp: 傷は　それほどでもない

text:
He’s been working nonstop lately,
so he’s just taking a break.
text_jp:
ここのところ働きづめだったからな
すこし　休んでいるだけだ

text:
Wait,
doesn’t that mean he’s on the vacation of his dreams?
A vacation!
text_jp:
それって
憧れのヴァケーションじゃないですか
“ヴァ”ケーション！

text: Yeah, something like that.
text_jp: まあ　そんなところだ

text: Jealous!
text_jp: うらやまし！

text: Nah, he’s probably bored out of his mind.
text_jp: いや　あいつは退屈してるさ

text: Yeah, maybe.
text_jp: そうかもですね

text: Haa…
text_jp: はぁ……

text: What’s wrong?
text_jp: どうしたんです？

text: Nothing. Keep talking.
text_jp: なんでもない　もっとしゃべってろ

text: Huh?
text_jp: はい？

name: Cloud
text: Wait.
text_jp: 待て

text: So what do we do with that guy?
text_jp: それでアイツ　どうします？

text: Senpai, uh…
text_jp: 先輩　あのですね

text:
Honestly,
I’m not convinced about this.
text_jp:
わたし　正直
納得してないんですけど

text:
Is there really any point
in chasing that black cloak?
text_jp:
あの黒マントを追跡して
なんか意味あるんですか？

name: Rude
text: It’s an order from above.
text_jp: 上からの命令だ

name: Rude
text: For us Turks, that’s all that matters.
text_jp: 俺たちタークスにとっては　それがすべて

text: Whoa~ Here comes the workaholic~!
text_jp: うわ～　仕事ニンゲン登場～！

text: But that guy’s beyond saving.
text_jp: でもアイツ　もう助かりませんよ

text: Let’s put him out of his misery.
text_jp: 楽にしてやりましょう

text: Chief Tseng would totally do it.
text_jp: ツォン主任なら　きっとそうします

name: Tifa
text: That’s awful…
text_jp: ひどい……

text: Who’s there!
text_jp: 誰だ！

name: Cloud
text: Sharp ears.
text_jp: いい耳だ

name: Tifa
text: Sorry.
text_jp: ごめん

text: Ah, aah!
text_jp: あっ　あ～っ！

name: Rude
text: Avalanche.
text_jp: アバランチ

name: Elena
text: I’m Elena, the Turks’ rising star!
text_jp: わたしはタークス期待の新人　イリーナ

name: Elena
text: I’ll take down you enemies of society!
text_jp: 社会の敵ども　成敗してくれる！

name: Aerith
text: Where’s Reno?
text_jp: レノは？

name: Rude
text: On a vacation.
text_jp: “ヴァ”ケーションだ

name: Elena
text: I’ll hold the fort while Reno-senpai’s away!
text_jp: レノ先輩の留守は　わたしが守る！

name: Rude
text: She’s still a rookie, but she’s a Turk.
text_jp: 新人と言えども　タークスだ

name: Rude
text: Don’t underestimate her.
text_jp: なめるなよ　と

name: Elena
text: Senpai!
text_jp: 先輩！

name: Rude
text: We’ll do it by the book.
text_jp: 訓練どおりにやるぞ

name: Elena
text: Yes!
text_jp: はい！

name: Barret
text: Hands up! Both of ‘em!
text_jp: 手をあげろ　両手！

name: Barret
text: Keep those dangerous toys right where they are.
text_jp: その物騒なもんは　そのままだ

name: Barret
text: Don’t try anything funny!
text_jp: おかしなマネすんじゃねえぞ

name: Barret
text: Alrighty then.
text_jp: さーてと

name: Barret
text: What should I do with these punks and the Sector 7 grudge, huh?
text_jp: 仲間と七番街の仇　どうしてくれようか

name: Tseng
text: You’re barkin’ up the wrong tree with that grudge.
text_jp: 恨むのは　お門違いだな

name: Tseng
text: You’re the ones who started this war.
text_jp: おまえたちが始めた戦争だ

name: Tseng
text: Things have changed on our end too—got a lot going on.
text_jp: うちも色々あって　状況が変わった

name: Tseng
text:
You’re all wanted fugitives,
but if you don’t get in our way from now on, we’ll let you slide.
text_jp:
おまえたちは賞金首だが
今後　我々の邪魔をしなければ見逃してやる

name: Barret
text: Look at you, actin’ all high and mighty!
text_jp: 上から　えらそうに！

name: Tseng
text: Take care of Aerith, yeah?
text_jp: エアリスを　よろしくな

name: Tseng
text: Elena!
text_jp: イリーナ！

name: Barret
text: Niiice!
text_jp: ナーイス！

name: Red XIII
text: Can you swim?
text_jp: 泳げるか？

name: Barret
text: What about Cloud and the others?
text_jp: クラウドたちは？

name: Tifa
text: You okay?
text_jp: 大丈夫？

name: Barret
text: Hell yeah! Feelin’ fresh and fired up!
text_jp: おう　スッキリ気分爽快だぜ！

name: Aerith
text: Can you climb up here?
text_jp: あがって　これそう？

name: Barret
text: Leave it to me!
text_jp: まかせとけ！

name: Tifa
text: Then let’s meet up at the exit.
text_jp: じゃあ　出口で合流しよう

name: Red XIII
text: I’ve seen a lot of guys like these before.
text_jp: こんな連中を　大勢見たことがある

name: Red XIII
text: Back at Hojo’s place.
text_jp: 宝条のところだ

name: Red XIII
text: Looks like severe Mako poisoning.
text_jp: 重度の魔晄中毒らしい

name: Barret
text: Damn Shinra…
text_jp: 神羅め……

name: Barret
text: But seriously, what’re they all up to together?
text_jp: しっかし　そろってなにしてるんだ？

name: Red XIII
text:
They might be chasing Sephiroth.
That’s what Cloud thinks.
text_jp:
セフィロスを追っている可能性がある
クラウドは　そう考えている

name: Barret
text: Cloud, huh…
text_jp: クラウドが……

name: Barret
text: He holdin’ up okay?
text_jp: 大丈夫か　あいつ

name: Barret
text: So~ how do we get up there?
text_jp: さ～て　どうやって上に行く？

name: Red XIII
text: Those vines might do the trick.
text_jp: あのツタが使えそうだ

name: Barret
text: What’re those punks doin’ way over there?
text_jp: あいつら　あんなとこでなにやってんだ

name: Aerith
text: Barret, he~y!
text_jp: バレット　お～い！

name: Barret
text: What’s up? Takin’ a break?
text_jp: どうした　休憩か？

name: Tifa
text: We can’t get across from here.
text_jp: 向こうに渡れないの

name: Cloud
text: Can’t you make a foothold from your side?
text_jp: そっちで　足場を作れないか？

name: Cloud
text: Do what you want.
text_jp: 好きにしろ

name: Red XIII
text: Can’t we drop something down there?
text_jp: あそこに　なにか落とせないだろうか

name: Aerith
text: Yes!
text_jp: やった！

name: Tifa
text: Thank you!
text_jp: ありがとう

name: Cloud
text: Saved us.
text_jp: 助かった

name: Barret
text: Don’t forget my reward!
text_jp: 報酬　忘れんなよ

name: Red XIII
text: Looks like we can’t open it from this side.
text_jp: こちらからは　開けられないようだ

name: Barret
text: Can’t ya open it from over there?
text_jp: そっちで開けられねえか？

name: Aerith
text: I’ll give it a try.
text_jp: やってみる

name: Barret
text: Thanks a ton!
text_jp: 助かったぜ！

name: Aerith
text: 2000, right?

name: Barret
text: Oh, uh… yeah…
text_jp: おっ　おう……

name: Barret
text: What’s that?
text_jp: なんだ？

name: Barret
text: This another one of nature’s tricks?
text_jp: こいつも　自然の力ってヤツか？

name: Red XIII
text: Looks like we woke it up.
text_jp: 起こしてしまったようだ

name: Barret
text: Leave the lullaby to Papa!
text_jp: 寝かしつけるのは　父ちゃんにまかせな

name: Barret
text: Mithril stairs? Pretty fancy, huh!
text_jp: ミスリルの階段とは　豪勢じゃねえか

name: Cloud
text: Took you long enough.
text_jp: 遅かったな

name: Barret
text: Found some huge mithril and got a little dazzled!
text_jp:
でっけえミスリル見つけて
目がくらんじまってよ

name: Red XIII
text:
This place could collapse any minute.
We should get out fast.
text_jp:
ここも　いつ崩れるかわからない
急いで出たほうがいい

name: Cloud
text:
Yeah, but
Shinra knows where we are.
text_jp:
ああ　でも
神羅に居場所を知られている

name: Cloud
text: They might be waiting to ambush us.
text_jp: 待ち伏せされているかもしれない

name: Barret
text: If I were them, I’d do the same.
text_jp: オレが連中でも　そうするぜ

name: Barret
text: But even so, we’ve gotta go.
text_jp: でもよ　それでも行かなくちゃならねえ

name: Barret
text: We saw *that* thing, after all.
text_jp: オレたちは　アレを見ちまったからな

name: Barret
text: Our mission’s to protect the planet.
text_jp: オレたちの使命は　星を守ること

name: Barret
text: If Shinra gets in our way, we fight!
text_jp: 神羅が邪魔するなら　戦うしかねえ

name: Cloud
text:
Let’s track the black cloaks.
They’re probably tied to Sephiroth.
text_jp:
黒マントの連中を追いかけよう
おそらく　セフィロスと繋がっている

name: Chadley
text:
Cloud-san, the Ancient Matter
should be nearby.
text_jp:
クラウドさん　エンシェントマターは
その近くにあるはずです

name: Chadley
text:
Please investigate thoroughly
for anything that fits the bill.
text_jp:
それらしいものがないか
入念な調査をお願いします

text: Funnga~!
text_jp: ふんが～！

text:
Uhihihi!
This has gotta be worth somethin’!
text_jp:
うひひひひ！
こりゃ　ネウチモンにちがいねえ

text: Uhehehe! Worth it, worth it!
text_jp: うへへへへ　ネウチネウチ！

text: Uh, what’s ‟worth it” mean?
text_jp: うん　ネウチってなんだ？

text:
Idiot!
It’s, uh… you know!
text_jp:
バカ！
ネウチってのは……あれだ

text: Treasure, that’s what! Right?
text_jp: お宝ってこった　なあ！

text: Hell yeah! We can wash our hands of this life!
text_jp: おうよ　これで足が洗えるぞ

text:
No more thievin’ crew—
we’re the ‟Beck Company” now!
text_jp:
もう　盗賊団じゃねえ
『ベグカンパニー』だ！

text:
You lot,
go sniff out more treasure!
text_jp:
おめえら
ほかにもお宝がねえか探すぞ

text:
Worth it, worth it,
worth it!
text_jp:
ネウチモン　ネウチモン
ネウチモン！

text: Treasure~ Treasure~!
text_jp: おっ宝～　おっ宝～！

text: Fugo~ Fugo~ Fugo~ Fugo~!
text_jp: ふご～　ふご～　ふご～　ふご～！

name: Beck
text: Huh?
text_jp: あん？

name: Beck
text: Wha—agya!
text_jp: って　あぎゃ！

name: Burke
text: Uhya!
text_jp: うひゃ！

name: Butch
text: Higya!
text_jp: ひぎゃ！

name: Burt
text: Fuga!
text_jp: ふがっ！

name: Beck
text: Wh— Why the hell are you punks here?!
text_jp: てっ　てめえら　なんでここに！

name: NPC
text: Why the hell are you punks here?
text_jp: てめえら　なんでここに？

name: NPC
text: Who are you?
text_jp: 誰だ？

name: NPC
text: What are you doing here?
text_jp: ここでなにをしている

name: NPC
text: What’d you find?
text_jp: なにを見つけた？

name: NPC
text: Hand over what you found.
text_jp: 見つけたものを渡せ

name: Beck
text:
Hey, we ain’t lettin’ you forget
the Beck Thieves’ Crew that easy!
text_jp:
おい　オレたちベグ盗賊団を
忘れたとは言わせねえぜ

name: Burke
text:
We were just livin’ easy in the slums,
but you kept comin’ after us!
text_jp:
スラムで　のんびり暮らしていただけなのに
何度も襲いやがって

name: Butch
text: Yeah, yeah!
text_jp: そうだ　そうだ！

name: Beck
text:
Thanks to you lot,
our righteous thievin’ crew’s done for!
text_jp:
おめえらのせいで
ゼンリョウな盗賊団はカイメツだ！

name: Aerith
text: Oh… really?
text_jp: そう　だっけ？

name: Cloud
text: What’re they talking about?
text_jp: なんの話だ

name: Beck
text:
Heh heh heh heh! The slums were too small for us!
From here on out, we’re takin’ over the world!
text_jp:
フッフッフッフ　オレたちにスラムは狭すぎた
こっからは　世界テンカイよお！

name: Burke
text: We’re washin’ our hands and goin’ ‟Company”~!
text_jp: 足を洗って『カンパニー』だ～！

name: Barret
text: What’re these idiots blabberin’ about?
text_jp: なに言ってんだ　こいつら

name: Beck
text:
Just like Shinra got big findin’ Mako,
we’re gonna strike it rich with treasure!
text_jp:
魔晄を見つけた神羅みたいに
オレらもお宝で　でっかくなるってワケよ！

name: Butch
text:
Hee hee hee!
A ‟Company” with treasure~!
text_jp:
いっししし
ネウチモンで　カンパニーだ～！

name: Beck
text: Haha! This is some crazy treasure!
text_jp: ハッハー　とんでもねえネウチモンよ！

name: Beck
text:
Looks beat-up,
and we don’t even know what it is,
text_jp:
見た目はボロいし
どういうブツかもわかんねえが

name: Beck
text: but man, I can feel some wild energy buzzin’ off it!
text_jp:
とにかく　すげえエネルギーを
ビンビン感じるぜ！

name: Burke
text: Sell this, and we’re rollin’ in gil!
text_jp: これを売れば　オレたちは大金持ちだ！

name: Aerith
text: Wait, could that be…?
text_jp: それって　もしかして

name: Beck
text: You punks after treasure too, huh?
text_jp: てめえらも　お宝目当てか？

name: Burke
text: We found it first, ya know!
text_jp: オレたちが　先に見つけたんだぞ？

name: Butch
text: The treasure’s ours!
text_jp: ネウチモンは　オレたちのもんだ！

name: Burt
text: Hunda hunda!
text_jp: ふんだ　ふんだ！

name: Cloud
text: Hand it over quietly.
text_jp: おとなしく渡すんだな

name: Beck
text: Tch, we ain’t the type to cave to threats like—
text_jp: けっ　そんな脅しに屈するオレたちじゃ――

name: Burke
text:
No good, we’re done for!
Uuuu, it’s over…
text_jp:
ダメだ　もうおしまいだあ！
うううう　おしまいだ……

name: Butch
text: Play dead, play dead!
text_jp: 死んだふり　死んだふりー！

name: Beck
text: You lot, calm down!
text_jp: おめえら　落ちつけ！

name: Beck
text: Listen up, I’ve got a killer plan.
text_jp:
いいか　よく聞け
とっておきの作戦がある

name: Beck
text: It’s called the ‟Decoy Strategy”!
text_jp: その名も　『オトリ作戦』だ！

name: Butch
text: Oh, a decoy!
text_jp: おお　オトリか！

name: Butch
text: What’s a decoy?
text_jp: オトリって　なんだ？

name: Beck
text: It’s you guys!
text_jp: おめえらのことだ！

name: Burke
text:
Oh, got it.
We’re the decoys… huh?
text_jp:
ああ　そうか
オレたちがオトリか……うん？

name: Beck
text: Good, it’s all on you now!
text_jp: うむ　あとはまかせた！

name: Beck
text: If ya survive, meet up at the hideout~!
text_jp: 生きてたら　カクレガに集合だ～！

name: Burke
text: Damn it, let’s do this~!
text_jp: チキショウ　やってやる～！

name: Burke
text: I’m dead, I’m dead…
text_jp: 死んでる　死んでる……

name: Burke
text: Ahh…
text_jp: ああ……

name: Burke
text: Ahh…
text_jp: ああ……

name: Butch
text:
Uuu…
I’m dead…
text_jp:
ううう……
オレ　死んでる……

name: Butch
text: Uu…!
text_jp: うう……！

name: Burt
text: Fugo…!
text_jp: ふご……！

name: Burke
text: Now’s our chance—link up with Aniki!
text_jp: いまだ　アニキと合流するぞ！

name: Butch
text: W-Wait~!
text_jp: まっ　待って～！

name: Chadley
text: Cloud-san.
text_jp: クラウドさん

name: Chadley
text:
I’ve detected movement of the Ancient Matter…
Please report the situation.
text_jp:
エンシェントマターの移動を観測しましたが……
状況の報告をお願いします

name: Cloud
text: Thieves took it.
text_jp: 盗賊に奪われた

name: Chadley
text: Understood, got it.
text_jp: なるほど　了解です

name: Chadley
text:
I’ve already pinpointed where the Ancient Matter’s headed.
Please continue the investigation.
text_jp:
エンシェントマターの移動先はすでに特定済みです
引き続き　調査をお願いします

name: Chadley
text:
Cloud-san,
I’ve detected the Ancient Matter.
text_jp:
クラウドさん
エンシェントマターを感知しました

name: Chadley
text:
The thieves should be nearby,
but it seems they’re busy cooking.
text_jp:
盗賊さんたちが近くにいるはずなのですが
どうやら　お料理中のようですね

name: Chadley
text:
If we approach head-on, they might run again.
Let’s sneak closer using the containers.
text_jp:
正面から行くと　また逃げられるかもしれません
コンテナに隠れながら近づきましょう

name: Burke
text: Leavin’ us behind’s messed up, Aniki!
text_jp: 置いてくなんてヒドイぞ　アニキ！

name: Beck
text:
Moron!
It’s for the treasure—can’t be helped!
text_jp:
バカやろう！
お宝のためだ　仕方ねえだろ

name: Beck
text: Even I’m feelin’ the boss’s vibe here.
text_jp: オレだって　ダンチョーの思いだ

name: Butch
text:
Boss?
What’s a boss?
text_jp:
ダンチョー？
ダンチョーってなんだ？

name: Beck
text:
Hm? Uh…
It’s the head of the thievin’ crew, got it?
text_jp:
うん？　う～ん……
盗賊団のボスって意味だ

name: Butch
text: I get it~!
text_jp: なるほど～！

name: Burke
text:
Phew…
Wonder if those odd-job punks’ll chase us down?
text_jp:
はあ……
なんでも屋　追ってくるかな？

name: Beck
text:
We’re holin’ up here
till those odd-jobbers give up.
text_jp:
なんでも屋があきらめるまで
ここで待機だ

name: Butch
text:
I’m starvin’…
Can we eat yet?
text_jp:
腹減った……
もう食っていいか？

name: Beck
text: Hold it in!
text_jp: ガマンしろ！

name: Beck
text:
I’m tellin’ ya, it’s tasty stuff—
gets real good when it’s charred like this!
text_jp:
ウメエダンつってな
こげるぐらいがウメエのよ

name: Burke
text:
Nah, but…
ain’t it a bit *too* charred?
text_jp:
いや～　でも
ちょっとこげすぎじゃねえか？

name: Beck
text: Shut it, amateur! Just watch!
text_jp: うるせえ　シロウトは黙って見てろ！

name: Burt
text: Grrr~…
text_jp: ぐう～……

name: Buggler
text: So hungry…
text_jp: 腹　減った……

name: Buggler
text: Meat~ Meat~!
text_jp: に～く　に～く！

name: Buggler
text: Sniff~… Smells so good!
text_jp: すぅ～……いいニオイだぜ

name: Buggler
text: Wonder if there’s some for us too?
text_jp: 俺たちの分もあんのかな？

name: Buggler
text: I’m a rare-meat kinda guy, y’know~
text_jp: 俺はレア派なんだよな～

name: Buggler
text: So hungry…
text_jp: 腹　減った……

name: Buggler
text: Meat~ Meat~!
text_jp: に～く　に～く！

name: Buggler
text: Sniff~… Smells so good!
text_jp: すぅ～……いいニオイだぜ

name: Buggler
text: Wonder if there’s some for us too?
text_jp: 俺たちの分もあんのかな？

name: Buggler
text: I’m a rare-meat kinda guy, y’know~
text_jp: 俺はレア派なんだよな～

name: Buggler
text: So hungry…
text_jp: 腹　減った……

name: Buggler
text: Meat~ Meat~!
text_jp: に～く　に～く！

name: Buggler
text: Sniff~… Smells so good!
text_jp: すぅ～……いいニオイだぜ

name: Buggler
text: Wonder if there’s some for us too?
text_jp: 俺たちの分もあんのかな？

name: Buggler
text: I’m a rare-meat kinda guy, y’know~
text_jp: 俺はレア派なんだよな～

name: Buggler
text: So hungry…
text_jp: 腹　減った……

name: Buggler
text: Meat~ Meat~!
text_jp: に～く　に～く！

name: Buggler
text: Sniff~… Smells so good!
text_jp: すぅ～……いいニオイだぜ

name: Buggler
text: Wonder if there’s some for us too?
text_jp: 俺たちの分もあんのかな？

name: Buggler
text: I’m a rare-meat kinda guy, y’know~
text_jp: 俺はレア派なんだよな～

name: Buggler
text: Huh? What’s that?
text_jp: あん　なんだ？

name: Buggler
text: Hmm, did somethin’ move?
text_jp: んん　なんか動いたか？

name: Buggler
text: Hyahha! Hee hee hee!
text_jp: ヒャッハー　イヒヒヒ！

name: Buggler
text: Crap, someone there?
text_jp: やばっ　誰かいんのか？

name: Buggler
text: Quit sneakin’ around!
text_jp: コソコソすんな！

name: Buggler
text: Huh? What’s that?
text_jp: あん　なんだ？

name: Buggler
text: Hmm, did somethin’ move?
text_jp: んん　なんか動いたか？

name: Buggler
text: Hyahha! Hee hee hee!
text_jp: ヒャッハー　イヒヒヒ！

name: Buggler
text: Crap, someone there?
text_jp: やばっ　誰かいんのか？

name: Buggler
text: Quit sneakin’ around!
text_jp: コソコソすんな！

name: Buggler
text: Huh? What’s that?
text_jp: あん　なんだ？

name: Buggler
text: Hmm, did somethin’ move?
text_jp: んん　なんか動いたか？

name: Buggler
text: Hyahha! Hee hee hee!
text_jp: ヒャッハー　イヒヒヒ！

name: Buggler
text: Crap, someone there?
text_jp: やばっ　誰かいんのか？

name: Buggler
text: Quit sneakin’ around!
text_jp: コソコソすんな！

name: Buggler
text: Huh? What’s that?
text_jp: あん　なんだ？

name: Buggler
text: Hmm, did somethin’ move?
text_jp: んん　なんか動いたか？

name: Buggler
text: Hyahha! Hee hee hee!
text_jp: ヒャッハー　イヒヒヒ！

name: Buggler
text: Crap, someone there?
text_jp: やばっ　誰かいんのか？

name: Buggler
text: Quit sneakin’ around!
text_jp: コソコソすんな！

name: Buggler
text: Phew~ Just my imagination, huh?
text_jp: ふう～　気のせいか

name: Buggler
text: Whoops, my mistake?
text_jp: おっと　勘違いか

name: Buggler
text: Hmm? They scrammed already?
text_jp: んん？　逃げちまったか

name: Buggler
text: Ha, don’t scare me like that!
text_jp: はあ　ビビらせんなよ

name: Buggler
text: Hmm~ Rats, maybe~?
text_jp: う～ん　ネズミか～？

name: Buggler
text: Phew~ Just my imagination, huh?
text_jp: ふう～　気のせいか

name: Buggler
text: Whoops, my mistake?
text_jp: おっと　勘違いか

name: Buggler
text: Hmm? They scrammed already?
text_jp: んん？　逃げちまったか

name: Buggler
text: Ha, don’t scare me like that!
text_jp: はあ　ビビらせんなよ

name: Buggler
text: Hmm~ Rats, maybe~?
text_jp: う～ん　ネズミか～？

name: Buggler
text: Phew~ Just my imagination, huh?
text_jp: ふう～　気のせいか

name: Buggler
text: Whoops, my mistake?
text_jp: おっと　勘違いか

name: Buggler
text: Hmm? They scrammed already?
text_jp: んん？　逃げちまったか

name: Buggler
text: Ha, don’t scare me like that!
text_jp: はあ　ビビらせんなよ

name: Buggler
text: Hmm~ Rats, maybe~?
text_jp: う～ん　ネズミか～？

name: Buggler
text: Phew~ Just my imagination, huh?
text_jp: ふう～　気のせいか

name: Buggler
text: Whoops, my mistake?
text_jp: おっと　勘違いか

name: Buggler
text: Hmm? They scrammed already?
text_jp: んん？　逃げちまったか

name: Buggler
text: Ha, don’t scare me like that!
text_jp: はあ　ビビらせんなよ

name: Buggler
text: Hmm~ Rats, maybe~?
text_jp: う～ん　ネズミか～？

name: Buggler
text: Hey, what’re ya doin’, punk!
text_jp: テメエ　なにしてやがる！

name: Buggler
text: E-e… Enemy attack~!
text_jp: てて……敵襲～！

name: Buggler
text: Wha— Odd-jobbers~!
text_jp: なっ　なんでも屋だ～！

name: Buggler
text: Enemies incoming~!
text_jp: 敵がきたぞ～！

name: Buggler
text: Suspicious guy spotted!
text_jp: あやしいヤツ　発見！

name: Buggler
text: Hey, what’re ya doin’, punk!
text_jp: テメエ　なにしてやがる！

name: Buggler
text: E-e… Enemy attack~!
text_jp: てて……敵襲～！

name: Buggler
text: Wha— Odd-jobbers~!
text_jp: なっ　なんでも屋だ～！

name: Buggler
text: Enemies incoming~!
text_jp: 敵がきたぞ～！

name: Buggler
text: Suspicious guy spotted!
text_jp: あやしいヤツ　発見！

name: Buggler
text: Hey, what’re ya doin’, punk!
text_jp: テメエ　なにしてやがる！

name: Buggler
text: E-e… Enemy attack~!
text_jp: てて……敵襲～！

name: Buggler
text: Wha— Odd-jobbers~!
text_jp: なっ　なんでも屋だ～！

name: Buggler
text: Enemies incoming~!
text_jp: 敵がきたぞ～！

name: Buggler
text: Suspicious guy spotted!
text_jp: あやしいヤツ　発見！

name: Buggler
text: Hey, what’re ya doin’, punk!
text_jp: テメエ　なにしてやがる！

name: Buggler
text: E-e… Enemy attack~!
text_jp: てて……敵襲～！

name: Buggler
text: Wha— Odd-jobbers~!
text_jp: なっ　なんでも屋だ～！

name: Buggler
text: Enemies incoming~!
text_jp: 敵がきたぞ～！

name: Buggler
text: Suspicious guy spotted!
text_jp: あやしいヤツ　発見！

name: Beck
text: Ah, you punks!
text_jp: あっ　おまえら！

name: Burke
text: R-Run~!
text_jp: にっ　逃げろ～！

name: Butch
text: B-But the meat?
text_jp: にっ　肉は？

name: Burke
text: They’re back again!
text_jp: また来やがった！

name: Beck
text: Scram!
text_jp: ずらかれ！

name: Beck
text: They spotted us—let’s bolt!
text_jp: 見つかった　逃げるぞ！

name: Burt
text: Grrr~!
text_jp: ぐう～！

name: Chadley
text: They got away, huh?
text_jp: 逃げられてしまいましたね

name: Chadley
text: They might come back for the food they couldn’t bear to leave behind.
text_jp: 食べ物惜しさに　戻ってくるかもしれません

name: Chadley
text:
We could hide and wait for a bit,
or leave the area for now and see what happens.
text_jp:
しばらく隠れて待つか
いったん　この場を離れて様子を見ましょう

name: Chadley
text: These thieves are pretty sharp, aren’t they?
text_jp: なかなか鋭い盗賊さんたちですね

name: Chadley
text: They’ll probably return eventually.
text_jp: そのうち　戻ってくるはずです

name: Chadley
text:
We could hide and wait for a bit,
or leave the area for now and see what happens.
text_jp:
しばらく隠れて待つか
いったん　この場を離れて様子を見ましょう

name: Chadley
text:
Looks like the thieves
are coming back.
text_jp:
盗賊さんたちが
戻ってきているようです

name: Chadley
text:
Let’s approach carefully this time
so they don’t spot us.
text_jp:
今度こそ見つからないよう
慎重に近づきましょう

name: Beck
text: Looks like those punks took off somewhere.
text_jp: あいつら　どっか行ったみたいだな

name: Burke
text: Heh heh, they didn’t nab the meat!
text_jp: えへへ　肉はとられてないぜ

name: Butch
text:
Phew~ Good thing!
Weren’t they hungry or somethin’?
text_jp:
よかった～　あいつら
腹へってなかったのかな？

name: Beck
text: Dumbasses!
text_jp: バカなやつらめ

name: Beck
text:
Alright, then—
let’s get back to cookin’ it nice and slow!
text_jp:
よ～し　それじゃあ
またじっくり火を通していくぞ

name: Burt
text: Funnga funnga!
text_jp: ふんが　ふんが！

name: Butch
text: Meat ready yet?
text_jp: 肉　まだか？

name: Beck
text: Not yet.
text_jp: まだだ

name: Butch
text: How about now?
text_jp: もう　いいか？

name: Beck
text: Wait a little longer.
text_jp: もうすこし待て

name: Butch
text: Can we eat it now?
text_jp: もう　食っていいか？

name: Beck
text: I said not yet, damn it!
text_jp: まだだつってんだろ！

name: Beck
text: Alright, it’s done roasting!
text_jp: よっしゃあ　焼きあがったぞ！

name: Beck
text:
Beck’s special roasted bird is complete!
Looks tasty, huh?
text_jp:
ベグ特製　鳥の丸焼きの完成だ！
うまそうだろ

name: Beck
text:
*Drool*… Heh heh,
turned out damn good if I do say so myself!
text_jp:
じゅるる……うへへ
我ながらうまく焼けたぜ！

name: Beck
text: Alright, you punks, time to eat~!
text_jp: よし　おまえら　食事にするぞ～！

name: Beck
text:
Hey, hey, food time, food time…
You idiots, at least try to keep up!
text_jp:
へいへい食事　食事だ食事……
おまえら　もうちょっと合わせろ！

name: Butch
text: Sniff sniff sniff sniff…
text_jp: すんすんすんすん……

name: Butch
text: Smells so good~!
text_jp: いいニオイだな～！

name: Beck
text:
I loaded it up
with Beck’s special spices, y’know.
text_jp:
ベグ特製スパイスを
ふんだんに使ったからな

name: Beck
text:
First, ya gotta savor the aroma—
that’s how the pros do it.
text_jp:
まずは　かおりを楽しむのが
ツウってやつよ

name: Burke
text:
Ohh, sniff sniff sniff sniff!
Inhale—exhale, inhale—exhale…
text_jp:
おお　ふんふんふんふん！
すーはーすーはーすーはー……

name: Beck
text: So, how’s it smell, huh?
text_jp: どうだ　うん？

name: Beck
text: Alright then, shall we dig in?
text_jp: そんじゃあ　いただくとしようか

name: Beck
text: I’ll take the thigh meat… Ow, hot!
text_jp: じゃあ　オレはモモ肉を……って熱っ！

name: Butch
text: Aniki, you okay?
text_jp: アニキ　だいじょぶか？

name: Beck
text:
Gotta cool this down first.
Alright, you punks, blow on it!
text_jp:
こりゃ　冷まさねえとダメだな
よしおまえら　息を吹きかけろ！

name: Burke
text:
Ohh, here we go, here we go!
Uh, on three…
text_jp:
おお　よしよし行くぞ行くぞ！
え～っと　せ～の……

name: Burke
text: Phew~ Phew~ Phew~ Phew~!
text_jp: ふ～　ふ～　ふ～　ふ～！

name: Beck
text:
Good, harder now—
more, more!
text_jp:
よし　もっと強く
もっともっと！

name: Burke
text:
Gah, they found us~!
We’re done for~…
text_jp:
だあ　見つかった～！
もうダメだ～……

name: Beck
text: Don’t freak out!
text_jp: 慌てんじゃねえ！

name: Beck
